column4: We ate at the bar after a show. Nachos and salad with a couple of glasses of wine. Just the right stuff at the right time in a energetic atmosphere. Thank you Duane!

It may sound noisy initially but if you find a good place at the bar, the noises fade away and you can enjoy the company of your partner. One of the best Hard Rock Cafes one finds anywhere in the world.
I had a very good burger here. The atmosphere is unique but do not expect hard rock music, there were more rap and pop video clips than rock.
We pre arranged breakfast for 100 people and they opened at 7am for us. Normal opening time is 8am. Standard USA breakfast, nothing special but was good enough for us before a long day in New York.
Nice Decor! Share a platter: crumbed chicken, spring rolls, rosti's, chicken wings, brochetta's, onion rings. Great music, visit the shop.
This is a great hard rock I've never been to a bad 1 in any country but this is 1 of my favourites so far great surroundings and the staff are brilliant

We booked online beforehand as I went a few years ago and there was quite a wait for walk ins. Food was nice, nothing to boast about but yummy. The staff are friendly and the restaurant is clean. Reasonably priced. Would go again.
Not dissapionted at all. It does what it says. Very nice food, drinks & service. We were very well looked after by our server & this is what we have grown to expect from Hard Rock.

column3: Lunch before 3PM performance with our grandson. New Yorkers who had never been to the Hard Rock in NY and delighted.
column4: We all had the Legendary Burger and it was delicious. Service was friendly and very good. Seating comfortable. Big place but we didn't feel closed in. Novel experience and priced well and according to our grandson, best burger sauce ever!
Had dinner in here with my daughter and granddaughter. Was very very busy but the food was fast, perfectly cooked and plentiful. The drinks also very tasty.
you have to go in time to get a table but it's worth it, the special hamburger is delicious as well as the tortillas with dissolved cheese and a very good attention
A very good meal of fajitas, ribs and salads. The only issue was the dressing missed from all three salads but it was put right quickly. Good service. The ribs were amazing. Really enjoyed.

column3: American breakfast in the heart of Times Square
column4: Quick, easy, friendly service. Easy place to get a traditional American breakfast if staying in the Times Square area

I've been to lots of Hard Rock Cafes round the world and this was the most disappointing. The service was pretty poor, the burgers were really small and the whole experience was simply disappointing. I'd recommend going to Hard Rock Cafe just not this one.
Really friendly staff. Food was well nice and place was nice and clean. Hardly any wait time (we did book a table) very good value for money.
Excellent place to visit. Fun atmosphere. Food good and waiter superb giving us chance to chose our own music. Recommend the vegetable fajitas
Rude bar attendant. Felt very rushed, waitress seemed to constantly glare at us! Cold food. We have been to many hard rock cafes around the globe and this is by far the worst experience we had!!!

What an overrated venue! The staff were horrible! Abrupt and unpleasant. Food was ok if you like spending over the odds for cold food that tastes like it’s straight out of the microwave! Best part was when we left the building!
Place was fully packed. We end up ordering our fave take away instead. That is the classic cheeseburger. Of course we didn’t miss out on our t shirt souvenirs.
We attended the first Hard Rock Cafe gala for Teachrock and Steven Van Zandt. Great staff! We had an excellent time at our VIP table and it was a wonderful night to remember.
Ate breakfast buffet with daughter while in new York very good selection juices tea coffee yogurts bagels cereal and hot selections 20 dollars each was worth it.
Great location in Times Square, only disappointment was there were no windows so no view! Food and drinks as good as any other HRC.
Great atmosphere, very good food. I ordered original burger and Chardonnay wine from California and was amazing
We had a great time with Cocktail and dinner. The crowd was electrifying and the wait was very short as we booked table. It was very satisfying and worth visiting again.
Always take in a HRC for sons Birthday as we like the busy vibe and the surrounds. Standard offering s at the Times Square establishment. Huge rib rack , cold beers , friendly waiting staff.

column3: Quick, tasty, if a little pricey
column4: Great service, food good, fair to high pricing. No hosts on arrival, but great once we got in. Would recommend for family fun night out
Everywhere we travel we go to a Hard Rock! Good food with friendly staff every time. We never waited for a table.

column3: great iconic decor and good food
column4: amazing service and really good food loved every min of it and really accommodating of my young son being it was very late in the evening, we had a nice dinner and a good look around and were seated so quickly even with NO reservation
Good food, very good service and very nice decoration. The location ofcourse is perfect. It's a must place to visit in NY.
Staff couldn’t do enough for us, food was delicious and also the cocktails. The restaurant was very clean and the atmosphere was amazing
Although they have reduced the food portions it is still a good place to eat and enjoy a full evening with the family.

Rooms are nice, food is really good. The only problem I had was that attracts a younger crowd. The location is great, next door from the ocean casino which is my pick for my age. All said I would stay there again.
Went here for my partners birthday, food was amazing, service fantastic and cocktails very good! Would definitely go back!
I loved it. This is a very big place and took us 45 minutes to get a table. But it was worth it. Food was awesome.

I love the vibes in this place! The service was really good! The food is awesome! I loved the pulled pork sandwich and the orange and feta side salad! Totally recommend if you love rock n roll and good food!

column3: First burger in USA = perfect burger
column4: Our first time in New York, we went to Hard Rock Cafe, order two cheeseburgers. The portion was really big, perfect taste. Good atmosphere.Highly recommend

Food lush and at an affordable price. Had to wait 30 mins to be seated as it was busy but expected this. Loved the DJ and his music, put everyone in a happy mood. Very busy atmosphere and food still came out very quickly.
On a ten day trip to NY we went there for dinner for the last three days in the row. It was the best food and the prices were affordable. The environment was excellent.
Very nice and cool place to visit. Good food and excellent service. Also good music they are playing in there ! Feel good! Highly recommended.
Came here on our first night in New York. Had a great server when we got there. Had a switch out of server part way through enjoyed our first one better.

column3: As i earlier said Hard Rock is a religion
column4: And visiting the cafe in every city, a ritual. Hustle bustle of broadway, snowfall, and a birthday celebration at HRC, sets your spirits up. The staff was amazingly helpful. Foos as usual sumptuous.

Decided to call in after a visit to the Empire state building. What a fabulous place. The place its self was very big but spotless . Staff very helpful and polite. Service was quick and friendly. Will definitely call back in .
Food and service was typical for the chain but the restaurant was FREEZING! What a waste of energy!!!!
This Hard Rock is as good as any other Hard Rock. Staff were friendly. Food was a bit too spicy for our tastes but good. Prices as expected not over the top.

Visited here with my son whilst on a break for his birthday. Prices reasonable compared to some NY prices and service was extremely good. We booked in advance so we did not have to wait. Thoroughly enjoyed. Nachos were fab.
I have visited a few Hard Rocks before and not too impressed but this one was very good. Some great memorabilia on display then good food and great service. Enjoyable.
Excellent menu, eclectic atmosphere along with great location! I visited there with a bunch of friends and had a great time.
We spent a nice family/birthday dinner at Hard Rock. Very nice service and the food delivered at the expected level. No surprises good or bad. Good atmosphere.
Awesome atmosphere, great service. All the music stuff was great. The food and service were really great too.

After a big disappointment in another restaurant I opted for the safe bet for a late lunch and were not disappointed. Food was great. Service prompt and attentive ambience fantastic. A pleasant surprise in time square

My daughter and her friends took a limo into the city and would not have missed hanging out at HRC. They were even lucky enough to catch an awesome Hoobastank set! The Whiskey Bacon Jam Sliders are killer!
Fast service and pleasant atmosphere, you would never believe that you are in Times Square, Food was served fast and to our liking,
We had an hour before a show and our waitress was very helpful and efficient. The food was fast and delicious.

As any Hard Rock Cafe, the food is decent and the beer is cold. Service was pleasant. But the reason for our visit was to see the really cool Beatles and John Lennon memorabilia. A must see for any fan.
I have already been to Hard Rock in London but this one is FANTASTIC. The food was very good and the people very nice. The place is huge. I loved it.

column3: Excellent Service, Delicious Food, Huge Inside
column4: This is the best Hard Rock I have been to in my travels. Perfect location, very good staff, the good was amazing. Such fun drinks to order, with or without alcohol.

column3: Always an awesome time at the HRC in NYC
column4: My wife and I stopped in for some lunch and drinks and Raffe the bartender took great care of us. Our drinks were made just right and my burger was cooked to perfection. Bravo HRC NYC for your great service.
Booked a meal in June ,live band great food great service.Great Hard Rock smack bang in Times Square.
What's to say, it's a Hard Rock Cafe. Oh, wait, in NYC on Broadway. Had a blast. The "Adult" beverages were nice and COLD! Food was pretty good too. Loved the atmosphere. Staff was really friendly.
We stopped by late one night. We were taken right to at table. The food was very good and priced pretty good. More for the environment. Located right in Time Square.
Went to the Hard Rock Cafe after a wander round Times Square. Fabulous memorabilia on show, great food, live music and exceptional service.
Decent food but great atmosphere. A good place to grab a bite and be entertained. My kids loved seeing the guitars and watching the music videos.
Went in for a quick breskfast, realised it was a buffet.. bonus. Pretty good food for a very limited small sized buffet. great atmosphere. excellent service.
very friendly staff and food is excellent. Combined with the items from Rock'n Roll history exhibited made the experience a very good one.
The food as usual was ok. Not amazing but not awful either. The server was really nice and took their time chatting with us. Cool to see the memorabilia.
As always, another HR venue to tick off, glass collection building. Great food, great atmosphere great service great location in Time sq.
We didn’t have to wait for a table. Our service was pretty good and food was great! Best burger I’ve ever had! Great atmosphere too!
A very busy restaurant so making a booking is essential. Service relatively quick considering the number of guest.
Hard Rock Coffee is cool for a drink and music. I enjoyed discovering old fashioned bass from Beatles and was full after a meal.
If you are a music fan then you must visit Hard Rock Cafe this is a must do,we went there three times for brunch and it was excellent value

After having lunch at the Hard Rock Cafe, we also ended up at the HRC for dinner (couldn’t find an alternative around 11pm). The food, drinks and service is super. So much better than my last visit in the HRC in Brussels.
Stay away! Get a pretzel! We had ordered for 16 people, but ended up at five different tables. And our burgers were some of the worst I’ve ever had! No. Just no!
This was my birthday treat , making memories It was a fab night with fab food with fab service what else can you ask for x
Had booked before we travelled and only waited for 5 minutes to be seated. Our waitress was attentive and happy to talk and take our photos. Food was average to me but had very nice cocktail.

column3: Great burgers shame they charge to be healthier
column4: I love the burgers in Hard Rock, the only one thing I don’t like is to eat healthy I had to pay an additional $3.50 to swap out my fries for a salad wanting to eat a healthier option should not be an additional cost.
Waiter was so much fun - food was good also! Restaurant was packed, but we sat at the bar and had lunch. Great time!
Time Square & Hard Rock it is the best combinations that you must have in New York City ... is the most and amazing place to stay every time !!! 👍👍👍👍👍👍🍾🍾🍾🍾🍾

Came here for our last meal before flying back to the u.k.It's a fantastic place if you are into music and memorabilia it might be a little pricey for what you get but for a one off visit it can't be beaten.
Always enjoy Hard Rock Cafe and this one was as good as any. Music not overly loud ~ which was good. Food as expected with portion size good. Service great. Drinks slightly overpriced.
Where ever we are in the world it has to be the Hard Rock,we love this place,the atmosphere,the music,the food,the shop.

...great food. We all enjoyed the California Cobb Salad for lunch before a Saturday matinee. Friendly service, attentive without being overbearing. The salad was out of this world with flavor and freshness. Nice ambience and great music.

Really enjoyable meal! We had heard the quality could be hit or miss but couldn’t fault the food! Really recommend booking in advance (we did this the morning we were planning on going) as the wait times can be long!!
Went for breakfast on my 60th birthday. What a way to start the day, all you can eat buffet, mimosas, coffee, pancakes, waffles, didn't need to eat again till night time !

column3: Enjoyable family meal. Food good and great service
column4: Family visit when it was not busy and the service was good. The food was expensive but of a high quality. It remains my childrens' favourite meal of the NYC holiday
This was probably the best meal we had during our stay. The Service from Luis was supberb. I have to day it was the most expensive meal we had whilst in New York but I guess you get what u pay for.
Hard Rock Cafe was everything I expected it to be. The food was tasty, staff friendly and they provided a good service. Certainly worth checking out if you're in the area.

This is the best Hard Rock I have been to and I have visited many around the world. The dining area is very large and staff are super friendly. You need to expect a busy restaurant with a hoard of tourists.
A very nice Hard Rock Cafe location. The food and service was great. Aways like to visit Hard Rock when I can.
Loved the size of this cafe, good location, great food, space to move around the memorabilia. Will definitley be visiting again!
Go for late lunch/early dinner. No wait at all. You will get your photo taken upon arrival so be prepared if you want to do a cool rockstar pose.
It's cool to get to see rock icons' stuff all over the place and to enjoy a beer in the bar. Great service and comfy place. thanks, HRC.

Worth the wait, the meals are huge and the drinks too. WE skipped starters and went straight for mains and desserts. Worth every minute waiting (20mins) The service is extremely busy and still very good service. Can be noisy at times ask for quieter table.

Came with my partner for steaks. Steak was absolutely beautiful, fell apart as you cut it, perfection. Service great, drinks very nice, food to die for. Got our daughter a T-shirt on the way out and the man in the gift shop was very kind.
Well this place rocks and roll great fun food pool beer wine and more the rms r all big clean great view too
Had to try it out whilst in USA, I would reccomend didnt manage to see any music / band whilst in here, how ever for was tastey seems to be the going rate for priced food locally worth a visit
Such a great experience and abeyance with good background music. The food was lovely and the staff were great and got some gift vouchers for the shop.
Best burger I ever had.... Prices are too cheap. I think I will be returning. Drink prices are also average.
Hard rock cafe is all over the world but this is the original and best one i have been to, great service ,great food and enjoyed listening to all the tunes .
I love any hard rock cafe, this one was just as good and just looking at the building was amazing. From the outside it looks like a theatre which is amazing.
Had a fab meal here, good food as always and exceptional service from our server Shaun. Kids loved it
What a fun delightful place, amazing decor friendly staff and lovely food, we nipped in a few times while in Times Square, food portions plenty and tasty atmosphere was fantastic
Great location and good food NY City food is pricey, so this is too great memberlia around restaurant
Went there a long time ago, love their nachos, it was a bit busy and took a while to be served but liked it anyway!
My boyfriend and I came here a few times because the food was so good and the atmosphere was electric! All the staff are very friendly and attentive to your every need. Would definately recommend!
Really enjoyed this restaurant, had the impossible burger was delicious. Loved the service and the cocktails and of course the music. Give it a go, book online before hand as it can be busy :-)
We booked to come here for lunch. The service was very good and friendly. The food was recieved pretty quickly. The food quality was very good, the meals were cooked to order and we were quite happy.
Right in the centre of Times Square Had a 10 minute wait as tables were busy. Usual hard rock menu, burgers etc Felt a little rushed but food was good

Fairly early dinner, so before main rush, and seated straightaway. Staff very friendly and helpful. Loved the atmosphere and the food - the fries were delicious. Opted for non-alcoholic cocktails which were superb.

Fantastic atmosphere and devine food. Really well worth a visit. Was just disappointed with the quality of the photos they took at the entrance, we would have bought them had they not been so blurredMore

We can only give it an average rating but most likely our own fault, as we waited to the last minute to have lunch and having tickets for 2pm show meant we had to order what was quickly prepared. 3 burgers, properly done that we swallowed and run. They were good but I had better. Our server Christine was prompt, gracious and quick in providing us with the check so we could run! Had we stayed longer and been able to enjoy the surroundings and other type of meal would have probably given it an higher rating.... it is loud, but of course....it's the Hard Rock Cafe!
We booked to come here for lunch. The service was very good and friendly. The food was recieved pretty quickly. The food quality was very good, the meals were cooked to order and we were quite happy.
Everything was very dissapointing. Expensive. The food did not even taste good. Dull sitting area and noicy surrondings. Way too loud music
Right in the centre of Times Square Had a 10 minute wait as tables were busy. Usual hard rock menu, burgers etc Felt a little rushed but food was good

We visited here whilst in Times Square. We was advised of a 20 minute wait time but was told we could sit at the bar whilst awaiting a table. We was given menus and ended up eating there.  The food arrived quickly and was average, burgers the same as anywhere else.  The service was good, some staff are friendlier than others, several looked to be very unhappy in their job.  I witnessed a very frustrated customer trying to get several waiters attention whilst being ignored several times over.  The atmosphere is a bit chaotic and stressful as it is so busy here.  Some cool memorabilia on show.  Music odd for a ‘hard rock’ cafe. More chart music.  Not sure we would rush back.

I booked our table at the Hard Rock Cafe in New York to celebrate my 50th birthday.  We arrived in plenty of time to have a cocktail or two to build up an appetite, and were taken directly to our table, a tall bar table right next to the loud, crowded, busy bar! Not my idea of fun but hey ho, closer to the cocktails we thought. We chose our drinks, in souvenir glasses of course and sat back and waited. A waiter then took our food orders, sharing starters to keep us going, followed by mains, and still we waited for the drinks - given our proximity to the bar it wasn't difficult to work out they had been forgotten but a few glances in their direction prompted a spark and sure enough the drinks arrived. A few sips in and two servers arrived with our food, our mains! We laughed and pointed out we had not had our starter yet and turned back to the cocktails in hand. One server hovered in the background looking embarrassed but the other server was not going to be deterred and reintroduced the mains, waving them in front of us (obviously thought we were a tad blind, demented or both)! We reminded her we had ordered and indeed expected our starter to arrive before our main,it had now stopped being remotely funny. We tried to return to our conversation and drinks but she had other plans and asked us directly if we were refusing to accept our main courses before our sharing starter. We said we wanted our starter first, as was customary, but we were all quite embarrassed by now and didn't want the situation to get any worse, we needed have worried, our wonderful, customer focused server astounded us with what came next. We were asked, in front of the other customers (remember we were almost sat in the bar too) were we really going to refuse these meals! She reiterated how much food we were going to refuse and how wasteful we were choosing to be;"you really gonna choose to waste all this food folks" she exclaimed to all, like any of this was our fault!!! The other server offered to take our food to keep warm in the kitchen but honestly, would anyone trust our delightful server not to "enhance" it in some way? I think not mate! Anyway by now she had dumped her two plates on the table, ruling out any other options,the food was here to stay. The mains were mixed up, wrong burgers, wrong sauces, wrong seasoning. We shuffled and shared from plates and kind of made up something like what we had ordered but who dared complain. The starter never appeared but a server came to explain that the mains had cooked before the starter, hence the mix up..... Incredible that anyone would ever attempt to cook them at the same timen but as our friends and fellow diners run an extremely busy London pub, who were they to correct the process! Embarrassing for all by now, time to drink the melted, warm cocktails and leave...... and no we don't want a bloody dessert (thanks for not asking). We have eaten in Hard Rock Cafes all around the world and I have to sadly say, this one in Times Square has made my birthday one to remember, for all the wrong reasons Sort yourselves out!!

Fairly early dinner, so before main rush, and seated straightaway. Staff very friendly and helpful. Loved the atmosphere and the food - the fries were delicious. Opted for non-alcoholic cocktails which were superb.

We had over an hour wait ahead of us with two young kids. A manager saw us waiting (sitting on the floor) and saw that we had our hands full. He was able to get us a table within 20 minutes. It was much appreciated! Table service was slow and our food was served a little inaccurate, but it was yummy!

This is the last place myself and my wife came too before we flew home and it was absolutely amazing food. We had a great service from a young gentleman who was coming to the table and seeing if we was happy with our food and drinks. Will definitely visit here again.
Had post dinner drinks at HRC, and it is vibrant. Drinks are relatively cheap compared to the restaurants in NYC. Good place to hang out & chill.
We have been twice at the HRC. Food was as tasty as always. Outstanding service delivered by Rafael. Thanks a lot. You are a great ambassador for the HRC New York.
Located in a very convenient place in NYC, the food was very good and the wait staff were friendly and helpful. Awesome nachos!!
We visit lots of HRC and have membership so we had a reward of entree for free. We both had the Fajitas which are delicious but a lot of food.
Food here was great matched by the service. The bbq pork burger was great as were the.nachos. loved the experience.
We arrived, got what we intended, paid and left, quick easy pleasant and not too expensive. When there's so much to see there's no time for eating haha
Visited twice during our 4 night stay as hotel is close to Times Square. Can be expensive but go early and you then do not have to queue for a seat

column3: Always visit a Hard Rock when we travel
column4: Visited this branch on our recent visit. Bigger louder and busier than other recent visits Best service of any of the recent branches we have visited our server was amazing...so friendly and food and drinks were prompt, hot and tasty

great place, staff friendly and efficient and the food is excellent, Brilliant atmosphere. We had a photo taken which if you want is added to the bill and it was still cheaper than other places we had eaten - great

I have been to six Hard Rocks and this is by far the best. While crowded, as expected, they were efficient in getting patrons in and out. The food was outstanding and better than you would expect. Well kept and clean setting.
Had a really lovely meal, staff were excellent & professional & didn’t wait long for the table or the food to arrive.
Great food and great service. Went on Friday night and didn't have to wait for a seat. Great atmosphere and good music on. $15 for a beer but you get to keep the glass!

It's New York, it's the Hard Rock Cafe, it;'s bold, brash, loud and what most of the customers want it to be. Food is average but that's not what they come for, the experience, the rush is all there - rock on!
I like Hard Rock Cafe all over the world, so the visit was great again. Good burgers, Long Island Ice Tea and service.
How could a rock fan be in New York and not visit the HRC?! For us, it was a dream come true to see the all the displays in person. That was food enough for our souls!

column3: Just a quick drink but a fun place to see
column4: We didn't eat here, but the vibe is cool, decor is great with so much nostalgia. Sat in the bar and it is loud, but hey, it is NYC!
Great menu with a good choice of dishes. Reasonably priced for New York. Great service. Lots of memorabilia and of course the Hard Rock shop.
Excellent evening atmosphere brilliant Service excellent as experienced in other restaurants food and drinks expensive but as we soon found out that's New York
Perfectly located HRC in New York. Amazing interiors and like everywhere perfect burgers. Staff bery friendly. So it is great place for burgers and some drinks.
We always hit a hard rock when we are away this trip was no exception. Plenty to drink and eat whilst listening to good music. We had to sit at the bar as it was so busy. But well worth it.
First morning in NYC we decided to go here for breakfast. Food was nice. A little expensive & service was slow but the staff were friendly & helpful. Good pancakes!
When it is about Hard Rock, is always a good idea and even better when it’s situated in New York! We had an awesome time there, full of amazing music and delicious food. Can’t wait to come back!
If you've been to one Hard Rock Café then you now the menu. This one is pretty big and serves up the same food. Enjoyed our visits.

column3: not as used to be.. same old food and bad staff
column4: I think this is the works Hard Rock Cafe... the facilities are so dark and dirty.. staff aiming for you to leave and the food is the same as ever. Do not recommend it.

column3: The best service we received in New York!
column4: We had a great evening at this restaurant celebrating Mum’s 50th Birthday. There was 12 of us and our waitress Amanda was so lovely and friendly and provided a faultless service, so thank you Amanda :)
Great service, Great food. Didnt have to wait long for our table and we went on a friday night at 5pm. Drinks were great. Our waitress was amazing. food was delicous.
This place really transports you to your own world of rock and roll, take me back anytime. This is such a tourist trap, but they are a quality restaurant despite
HRC is one of my favorite places. This location provided great food, great service and is nicely located. Waiting time was over an hour but the experience compensated the waiting time.

Arrived around 10:30pm after a full day at niagra falls. We were seated immediately and had wonderful service throughout. We ordered a burger meal between us as portions are large. Food was fabulous as ever
service was fast. food was okay. didn't like the fact that the restaurant was in the basement, however I had limited time to get a bite to eat so I ended up here. it okay. nothing fancy
had food here on a very busy saturday evening in september. Got seated alot quicker than we got told which was a bonus. The food was very good also.

We stopped in for a brew and nachos and rest. Place was fun, great service. Great nachos. Gift shop is spectacular, bought alot of shirts, and stuff. Went back again. Gift shop staff were fun and attentive.

Little atmosphere and overpriced food and drink. The black bean and quinoa burger was disgusting - they really should come up with a DECENT vegetarian option. Good service. London is a much better venue
I really do not underdtand people who like these place ( I know many ) and are happy to buy a 3 usd shirt for 30 bucks just for the logo ! absolute crazyness the food is not gret but not so bad too
Nice ribs, steak was very dry (ordered medium but the one we got was more well done) service is very hostipale. Pricing OK.
Greta food and overall awesome experience at the New York hard rock. This is a very busy hard rock and although had to wait to sit down it was well worth the wait

column3: Shopping original "Hard rock cafe" products is perfect
column4: You can shop very nice original products manufactured for "Hard Rock Cafe".Very crowd shop but you can find everything you want.Nice to watch,nice to shop.
A fun place to visit. Lots of cool memorabilia and great music. The portions are big. The nachos were great. Friendly service. Quite expensive but it is Times Square after all.
A HRC rarely disappoints me. This is one of the greatest I have been. Great memorabilia, plus they serve my favorite bbq chicken wings in the whole world.
It was ok. The food was mediocre. The only part of the good I liked was the burger. The place was cool though. A little on the expensive side.

We had a lovely meal here we waited about 25 minutes to be seated. We were served by Monica who was lovely she explain the menu and was really on the ball with serving everyone. The pull pork burger is highly recommended.
I visited Hard Rock Cafe NYC on my birthday so it good music, reasonable price. I will come again. Let come and enjoy
Called in for lunch, friendly, efficient and professional staff, speedy service with a smile, comfortable seating and excellent food.
Great service. Wonderful food! Out of town family sightseeing in the city. Great place for lunch, staff even led a chorus of Happy Birthday and brought out a "Birthday Sundae".

We visited Hard Rock Cafe in January so it was not very chaotic. Very good music ,the staff was very friendly and attentive, very good variety of drinks. Worth the visit 10000%,Would come again for sure!!!!!!!!!!!
Always good come back in a great place... After some time, I went back to Hard Rock Cafe NYC, wonderful place with best burgger and great services... Go there and enjoy
As always with hard rocks - great service and food - couldn't fault - didn't book but turned up and advised needed to wait for table but was only short time - great staff
The food is great and the waiters are terrific. Prices are great too! Our family choices ranged from salmon to steak to fajitas to burgers.
Food was really good, server was awesome. For Nashville it was kind of bland and weird. Not a ton of stuff on the walls. The music video TVs where kind of annoying

Really enjoyed Hard Rock cafe New York. Food and drinks were reasonably priced in comparison to other similar restaurants on New York. Food was a good quality, yummy burger! Kids menus were great and service was good too. Would definately recommend.

column3: Best Hard Rock Cafe we have been to
column4: This Hard Rock Café is just huge with the most amazing collection of memorabilia that we have ever seen. Add to that great food and good service with fair prices, what else would you need?

column3: You need to see this one
column4: You need to see this one. You have to see this once because you love rock or because you want to look inside. Original object and photos can be seen on the walls about lengendary musicians.
This is a very busy multi level restaurant. We were greeted in a timely fashion and seated after a very short wait. The meal was nicely served and pleantyful. Reasonably priced for New York.

column3: Lovely place for a fun group meal!
column4: Resturant lived up to the good reputations that HRCs have - staff were engaging and delightful. The food was of a good standard, with interesting options available to order. Well worth the visit, looking forward to the next one!
Food basic & expensive . Staff welcoming & good service but food a let down , my ribs was luke warm . Would not return

We stopped in the Hard Rock Cafe gift shop for some souvenirs while visiting NYC. We didn't eat the food here, so I can't comment on it. We did, however, buy merchandise and the folks working in the gift shop were friendly and helpful.
They need to hire front door/host desk staff that have manners and are trained to be customer friendly. Deplorable.
Sticky tablecloth, no atmosphere, veggie burger wasn't nice, quite expensive for the quality of the food.
We stopped here with two young kids after visiting Times Square and it was a perfect little hideout with food the kids loved. Definitely a great stop to get out of the heat.

column3: Great location in Times Square. Quick service
column4: Hard Rock is right in Times Square. The staff is nice. Food was average/acceptable/expensive as expected. the Hard Rock store of souvenirs in right inside.

Great food, excellent atmosphere, very busy but the that added to the vibe. The service was good considering how busy it was. The fact it was in time square was a bonus. Another hard rock ticket off the list 👌

column3: The staff were really nice and it had free wifi...
column4: We went one evening to be told there was a 20 min wait, which was fine so we sat down in the foyer to wait. After about 10 minutes the pager thing buzzed and we were sat at our table, where we were greeted by...More

Staff as friendly as you would expect for a HRC. This one is on Times Square so not hard to find!  We arrived on a Friday evening to be told it would be a 2 hour wait. We reserved a table for a few nights later so then didn't have to wait.  Similarly to the service, the food and drink is as good as you would expect for a HRC. Prices probably a little above average.  As ever, great selection of memorabilia around the walls.

Was looking for somewhere to eat in NYC as unexpected few hours to kill in the city. Came here for food and wasn't disappointed. Was expecting the food to cost more to be honest so was nice when it wasn't as much as we thought. Had the nachos for a starter which was plenty for two to share. Had burger between us too. Chips were very tasty. The cocktails were big and you get to keep the glass when you leave (don't worry you get to keep a brand new one)....collect on way out. Had very pleasant engaging waitress who was very helpful and friendly. All in all this was a cool place to eat with all the nostalgia around you and the good food.
We stopped here with two young kids after visiting Times Square and it was a perfect little hideout with food the kids loved. Definitely a great stop to get out of the heat.

column3: Great location in Times Square. Quick service
column4: Hard Rock is right in Times Square. The staff is nice. Food was average/acceptable/expensive as expected. the Hard Rock store of souvenirs in right inside.

column3: Food was nice but far too busy
column4: It was extremely busy when we visited during our trip to NYC. It was around 10pm and we found our own table after being told to wait. We ordered cocktails and burgers which came quite quickly however we were going to order more cocktails but the waitress brought the check over before we asked for it so we took it as our hint to leave!

Traveled on a whim to the Hard Rock New York location. It was SO good. We were seated almost immediately and didn't have to wait long for our food....As I was writing this, I was settling the bill. The waitress brought back SOME of my change but with no receipt. Not good Hard Rock.

Great food, excellent atmosphere, very busy but the that added to the vibe. The service was good considering how busy it was. The fact it was in time square was a bonus. Another hard rock ticket off the list 👌

I've visited Hard Rock Cafe in many other countries and my expectation of this one was high. I ordered the ribs, burger, Buffalo fried cauliflower and lots of beer. The ribs were not the greatest, the Buffalo cauliflower were good and tasted great.  Took a really long time to get the waitress to bring the bill. I had to talk to the head waiter in order to get their attention.

This is a very popular restaurant and is often busy. Go early, they will give you a time to return and expect to have to wait in the waiting room a bit. We went for a early dinner at 5pm were given a buzzer and had to wait 30 mins. This is pretty normal for this site. You will be disappointed if you expect to rock up and be seated immediately.  It occurs like a bucket list item to have dinner at the Hard Rock in New York City. We thoroughly enjoyed it.  We have been to different Hard Rocks before and find it has something great for all the family. And Time Square didn't disappoint.  The Kids Loved the kids menu, We loved the Burgers, Steak and Fajita's. And if you have room the apple pie/crumble is always a great desert.  Hard rock continues to deliver a consistent enjoyable experience. While not the best food you have ever had. It is good, enjoyable and consistent.

Hard Rock has a great atmosphere with great food and great service. Our waiter who was called Timothy was fantastic he genuinely made us feel valued and couldn't do enough for us, checking regularly that our food and everything was ok.
Dropped in here after a days sight-seeing. Had food and a few drinks at the bar because it was busy. Similar to other HR's I've been to, didn't disappoint.
Food was average, decor was average, service was average. Nothing special. No different than any other Hard Rock Cafe

Long wait for table so ordered at the bar. Chicken Caesar salad was delish with plenty of chicken. Two pulled pork burgers were fab, couldn't finish them. Drinks were nice and cold, perfect. Prices are typical NYC.
Burgers and music, that's what you want from Hard Rock Cafe. Both meat and vegetarian burgers were exquisite. Place can get crowded but it is not that noticeable when you are having a good time.

Went twice first was really good and the waitress that had just moved from Washington was brilliant. Next visit cold food terrible staff and I'm sorry but the Mexican staff need to go on customer service course
OMG if you go to Time Square you have to go to Hard Rock the food was amazing the atmosphere was super,the staff were excellent a must go to.

Eating here in New York, at Time Square...in this wonderful place...it has been great! Delicious food (special advice for hamburgers and mix of appetizers!!!), beautiful and very very good cocktails, kindness... our favorite place to eat in Manhattan! Try it soon!

column3: Met our needs , but nothing special
column4: Our daughter has allergies and the could accommodate us. The waitress was nice and the food came quickly, but it was nothing special!

column3: Always a good time and good food
column4: We took our kids here on a school trip to NYC. They were really taken in by the memorabilia. The service and food is quite good. The staff is efficient and all 50 of us were served without much delay.
Usual hard rock cafe. They had a veggie burger which i'd not seen elsewhere before. Food was pretty good.
Dropped in for a pint and a break from the sun. The bar is underground and when you are in there it’s perfectly air conditioned, great bar staff were very friendly also
I travel a lot and if there's a HR nearby I'm there. This is a GREAT one! And what a great location in Times Square. Highly recommended!
Had a great experience here. The food was 10/10. The service off Delilah was amazing. The atmosphere great. Good music and not over priced compared with the rest of NYC.
Booked here and went in on time , had to have a photo with a guitar before going to restaurant which i'm not sure about , food lovely , staff pleasant and great atmosphere - worth a visit.
Great end to the day on Broadway seeing Chicago and now this.. Atmosphere, drinks, dinner, dessert, all good!!! Highly recommend!
Great location, very friendly staff, good food, beverages and service. The cheeseburger, fries and Hurricane were really good!
Lovely food reasonable price great atmosphere. Wide range of food to suit all tastes. Huge range of cocktails and drinks

We visited here for some late night food whilst in NYC and enjoyed our experience. The food was great, the portions generous and the staff friendly. Location is also excellent, would go back if in town again.
This a great place for dinner, food was really good and the restaurant itself is very impressive, fantastic atmosphere and perfect for families
First visit for me. Amazing Hard Rock. Great service. The wall of 300 guitars is fab. Good selection of memorabilia including heavy metal which is quite rare in the other Hard Rocks I’ve been!

The food is reasonable priced for NYC, waiter was very good and pleasant and the Burgers excellent. Very quick service so take some time between ordering your dessert otherwise you will feel that you are being rushed.
Reasonably priced, waiter very pleasant. Food came really fast- no time in between courses.Try the Jumbo Combo dessert- delicious!!!
had a late late dinner at the hard rock...it's always fun and playing great music...food was good...it's fun to go to...

column3: A must do in New York
column4: Great place to take teenagers with excellent mixed music and a bit of theatre. Family friendly food but personally disappointed that there wasn't a vegan choice, not even soya or almond milk for a coffee. Average service with a higher than average price tag.
Just like Planet Hollywood, overrated and overpriced. Can't go wrong with wings and burgers. The memorabilia is very cool.
I love this Hard Rock right in Times Square. It does not participate in the Hard Rock Rewards program, but it is still a great place. Love the cauliflower wings.
Good food, great service, competitive prices for similar restaurants. We jumped the queue as I had an online reservation booked. Worth a visit! My second visit in 18 months!

column3: Quality Service, Awesome Burgers, Good Music
column4: 3rd Hard Rock Cafe I’ve visited and service was excellent as always and the food delicious! Would recommend the local legend burger and drinks wise the air Mexico 👍 would advise booking or expect to wait a while for a table!

column3: Really good food, so much fun
column4: The menu is not large, but the food is really good, presented very creatively, large portions, very good service. Unfortunately I was so full I couldn't eat desert.

column3: Loved our experience-Handled a group of 200+ students with no problem
column4: Loved our experience at HRC in Times Square. Food came out hot and the staff handled a group of 200+ high school students with ease. DJ had some great tunes playing and the kids had a blast! Loved it...
Service and experience were fun! Worth the visit. Food was just okay, but that is to be expected when ordering from the "large group" menu. I would go again.

As per usual, this HRC offers a great variety of good food, attentive staff en good atmosphere. As a frequent HRC visitor I enjoyed my visit here. As always the fajitas here are amazing, as were the burgers.
Big group, limited menu. Our water was awesome and worked his butt off. Chad? The food was good and the cookies were saved for later. Thanks for dinner!
Went with my two guy friends! We were seated right away and the food was fantastic. I had an amazing pulled pork sandwich!

column3: Unexpectedly average for a Hard Rock
column4: Unfortunately our visit to the Time Square Hard Rock didn’t hit all the right notes... very rude staff, rescued by good food.

column3: Good service, Good food, Good atmosphere . . . but book up in advance or be disappointed.
column4: Good service, Good food, Good atmosphere . . . but book up in advance or be disappointed as the queue can be quote long and you may not get a table.

Traditional bar and a must see. I liked the environment, with many objects of singers and consecrated bands. Worth going to. Bar tradicional e imperdível. Gostei do ambiente, com inúmeros objetos de cantores e bandas consagradas. Vale a pena ir.
Fab atmosphere fab staff and fab food . Would definitely recommend this place to relax and eat . Worth a vist
Very nice place with a lot of pictures, clothes and guitars mainly of the biggest starts of the world wide music. Fair prices and good american food. I enjoyed so much my lunch there.

Drinks were great! Food was delicious! Our server was amazing! However, they couldn’t get their act together to sit us!! Plenty of tables around and we just got shuffled around until we ended at the bar; had to have our dinner standing up.

Staff were friendly and couldn’t do enough to help nothing was too much trouble . Food was amazing and loads of it well price for such a well know restaurant chain . Really enough the time there well worth going .
We decided to beat the crowds and had lunch at 11. Restaurant was almost empty but was filling up as we ate. Service was good. Food was very good.
Waited at fairly empty bar to be served. After waiting over five minutes while bar staff chatted to a customer. Gave up and left
Amazing staff & music, Food was good too, great Location. If you are a smoker, you have to go upstairs on the street to smoke, but staff is helpfull :)

column3: Go here over and over again
column4: Hard Rock is just so awesome. Service was great and food was just so delicious. Burgers were so tasty! Gift shop is a bit pricey but the clothing looks nice.
First experience of a Hard Rock Cafe. Good choice of food and drink and service was efficient. Would definitely visit again in the future. Enjoyable visit!
The kids were excited about visiting Hard Rock in New York. The experience wasn't good. Staff were unpleasant and the food was the worst we had in North America. Planet Hollywood was so much better.

column3: Burger at the Hard Rock New York
column4: Good food and good service late at night (we arrived at around 11:00 p.m cold, tired and hungry. A bit pricey for a burger but hey, we were on holiday.
Great food, good service and reasonably priced! Can recommend the potato skins for a starter and burger for main, staff were friendly and helpful too
We had a Legend burger, Fajitas and cocktails all very nice and all the staff very friendly be prepared to wait for a table as can be manic but worth it.
Food was absolutely awful! Tasted like it had been heated in the microwave. Service was slow on a not so busy night. Definitely not worth a visit

Live the Hard Rock Cafe. They do the best nachos!!! And this trip, I actually think I had one of the best steaks I have ever had! Great service, great food, great cocktails, slightly overpriced, but you’re paying for the hard rock experience!
Visited HRC with my daughter a few times during week stay in NY. Food was all right. Service was great.The music, as in most hard rock café's throughout the world was great.

We thought it might be busy so tried to book a table online but none were available, so thought we’d just try our luck and turn up. We were seated straight away, service was excellent, food was great and cocktails very tasty!

We entered and at first we didn't understand which way to go, but once we figured that out, we met a good server/ bar tender. He made us great cocktails, good quantity. Portions of food was also good! Great music and amazing decor

column3: In the heart of Times Square
column4: Good food and friendly service but overpriced. The place is very dark too. Overall though it is one of these places where one needs to go when in NYC.
lovely staff, great atmosphere, great food went here first night felt very comfortable, good background music

column3: I always love the Hard Rock. It Rocks Hard
column4: Yes I said the joke of my title when I was there. Yes it made me laugh...Anywho I always enjoy the Hard Rock and places like this. You know what your getting when you eat here. Music and atmosphere was allot of fun as well.
Lovely food with high quality. Workers very nice and friendly added pictures of food. Not the cheapest but the best burgers in NYC
$170 for 2 starters, 3 burgers and a couple of drinks.....terrible music. The waitress was attentive but I think that was all the place had going for it. It trades on its name so inflated prices

Brought my daughter here. She was performing on Broadway that weekend and entertainment is her blood. Naturally we had to bring her here. She loved it. Good service good food great experience. A must visit when seeing NYC.

Every country we visit me and my boyfriend always make sure we visit a hard rock cafe! New york hard rock cafe has amazing service from all the staff, great atmosphere, overall amazing. Always a pleasure visiting! And will continue to do so!

Standard Hard Rock Cafe. Good food and good service you'd expect. Restaurant and menu very good, service friendly and attentive. Rock memorabilia here probably better then most. Recommend as a reliable restaurant but nothing out of the world.
The salad was dry and tasteless. The burgers were good but overpriced. The song selection was awful, such as Britney Sears and Helena Gomez, and inappropriate.

column3: Every time we are in New York we visit HardRock
column4: 30 Minutes waiting time and as every time - super service very good cocktails and delicious burger (original legendary burger) We‘ll be back next time :-)
Coffee or drinks in bar really good. Souvenirs are a must. I love this place, so much when in twice.
Arrived late and this restaurant was close to our hotel. Food was good, our server was incredible giving us numerous ideas on how to tackle NYC.
An obvious place to try in New York the food was good sized. Lil bit expensive but what would one expect for a tourist
Hard Rock cafe, beautiful building in a best The hard Rock cafe is more attractive for the outside visiters because such a beautiful place is that., best and tasty dishes, we all like the

Never my 1st choice, however after the hockey at the Gardens, and a few beers in, this was open so we went in. Really cannot complain at all. 4 Burgers all cooked well to order. Good fries, good service, decent beer and reasonable price.

column3: We waited for an hour to be seated, but I didn't care I wanted to eat there and I was not disappointed.
column4: The wait was over an hour, but the food was wonderful and the staf were the best I didn't mind waiting because of the customer service that the staf shown me and the food too.
Enjoyable family meal whilst sightseeing in NYC. Loved the rock memorabilia. Friendly service but very busy as expected.
Lots of products to sell from Hard Rock Cafe items and a great collection of memories items like guitars and stuff. With restaurant (always full)
It was not very crowded when we went for lunch and we were seated promptly. The service was quick and efficient and the food was good as expected. Nothing extraordinary.
Ok food if you like a burger and fries. Crowded and noisy atmosphere, but to be expected in Times Square.

High quality service. Food was as expected - plain but reliable. Wonderful to look at the wealth of memorabilia around the restaurant, but uncomfortable at times due to the location of tables with diners seated.

Eat lunchtime. We were sat down immediately in the front window so we had a great view for people watching. The guy that looked after us was excellent. Very cheerful and helpful and the ribs were delicious.
I always seek out Hard Rock Cafe wherever I go the food is always good and I just love the t shirts this time I went for the buffett breakfast and at 19$ it's real value for money,
Considering the size of this restaurant the service was excellent. Can recommend the cocktails too. We had burgers & they were amazing
One of the best Hard Rocks. Long wait but efficient service. Good menu as always and a buzzing atmosphere.

Decided to eat here before heading off to JFK. Service was prompt and the food was hot and tasty. Portions are very generous. Music could be more rock rather than pop. Hope all goes well for our waitress Romel and her new baby.

Went for lunch, not for the first time here, it will be the last though. The main courses were served when we’d barely started the starters....and the old Veggie burger has been replaced by an inedible cauliflower burger. Simply dreadful.
Hard rock is standard usually from one city to another. Food was average but good. Great place but was super busy. Ask for a table n at the bar instead of waiting for some time for a table!
I'm a hard rock fan but this place is crowded and really not worth it. There are probably better places in the vicinity with better food. Not saying its bad, but just not mind blowing or anything.
first place we ate in the big apple. Good burgers and ribs. Good cocktails. on the pricey side but the atmosphere is electric and to be expected in NYC.
Good as usual. Great fajitas and salads. Friendly staff. The nicest Hard Rock in the heart of Times Square. Amazing memorabilia. Oreo cheesecake not to miss!
Very friendly staff and good experience they had some cool items on display which is worth seeing. Service was quick and we didn't have to book.

column3: Not Bad for a Tourist Trap
column4: While walking around Times Square and in the mood for some food, stop by the Hard Rock and have a good burger surrounded with music and memorabilia.
Had a wonderful evening. Tarrie the retail manager was awesome. Very friendly & a great sense of humor. This place is ROCKING!!!!
Good choice of freshly cooked food plus fresh French toast, waffles or pancakes brought to your table. Selection of pastries too. Mimosa was a nice touch to set us up for the day.

Amazing food, reasonable prices for a prime spot, really friendly staff. Over the course of a week we found ourselves in here a lot just for drinks etc because the atmosphere is great. Definitely worth the visit.

Visited here for a drink in the bar, told no tables free, yet loads empty and not reserved. The barman was very miserable while serving us a beer and cocktail! But have to say the cocktail did taste good so not all bad!
Went to take a vacant table for two only to be ushered into another dining area. Waiter took what seamed like ages to serve our drinks and the same when I asked for the bill.
Delicious food and drink, great atmosphere and faultless service! Will definitely be visiting again!

We stopped in after a Broadway show and it was crazy. Loud vulgar music, couldn't even take to each other. Ordered a brownie and apple crisp and they each could serve 3 people. I hate wasting food. Anyway not a pleasant experience.

Ate here with a school group. Waited a little while to be seated but were quickly served. We chose burgers and chicken fillet burgers. All were good and went down well. Staff efficient and friendly. Noisy and busy. Think choices good.

column3: A warm welcome and a great team
column4: We came we ate, we were welcomed, satisfied and had great fun. Who could ask for more! No really it’s honestly that good.
We stopped by for 2 drinks and 2 appetizers one night. At $68, it wasn't exactly cheap...but it was a fun atmosphere and right in the middle of all the action. Noisy but the food was good.

We had great burgers and as good fries as there are on the planet! Excellent! Be sure to wash your hands first, and after--it's a very tactile experience! (They could leave the lettuce out, it just makes things slide around.) Glad to have experienced it!
What dan I say it’s the hard rock and had to get my 31st different shooter! Great either brick drinks and a fabulous atmosphere. #loveallserveall
Stopped in as we always visit the Hard Rock wherever we are in the world.. Was greeted by a really rude waitress who had no interest in being kind or helpful. We left and took our custom elsewhere.
We tried the New York Strip which was beautifully cooked. The staff were friendly and very helpful. The decor was the usual memorabilia you expect at HRC. Good quality food and overall experience.
If you enjoy the Hard Rock experience this is a decent one - lots of history/memorabilia to explore. Beyond that - Prices are high. Service is SLOW. Food quality is not good.
Great place with a lot of memorabilia, Always seem to be crowded at Dinner time. Great food & drinks. Good portions.
While in NYC we stopped by the Hard Rock Cafe Gift store in Times Square. The employees were very helpful and nice. Got a cool shirt for my collection of Hard Rock t shirts.
This cafe is smack bang in the middle of Times Square and you know that your going to get great food. They did not disappoint, great atmosphere and a legendary burger to die for!

column3: A must for lunch or dinner
column4: Service was excellent. Couldn't fault it at all. Our server was always there and making sure we were ok. Food was good. Price is kind of what you expect.

column3: Went to the time square location for a company event
column4: Went to this location for a company event and can't wait to go back with my kids. I did not pay for my meal but the ambiance and decor on the wall is well worth the visit even to visit the gift shop..
We have been to many Hard Rock Cafes but this is the biggest by far. We had a nice meal and I was surprised by how good it was. The server was very good also.
Enjoyed lunch at Hard Rock Cafe. Good food and fast service. This location has an excellent store for shopping.
What?! It's The HardRock! Get a burger and onion rings (done perfectly). Delish! Friendly wait staff - good tunes. Cool Rock - n - Roll Artifacts. Plan at least one meal here.
Ordered the hamburger with cheese,lettuce, onion, BBQ sauce, along with a house salad. They both was delicious and very filling
Great lunch, great food, service was great. Atmosphere was also perfect, this is a must visit when in New York!
Up to the usual Hard Rock Cafe standard. Staff were polite and helpful. In NY? got to have their NY steak, it was lovely washed down with a couple of cocktails, great.
Enjoy a great American Style dinner while listening to music. There are lots of Instruments, mostly electric guitars which belonged to famous rock and roll musicians or singers
very good food and very good ambiance. it is guaranteed that you will have a nice ambiance as well. very satisfied
Loved the experience here. Staff were so friendly and the food was good and served quickly. Highly recommend for a nice evening out

Take my advice and do not visit this venue. It is without a doubt The worst Hard Rock I have been to around the world. If you want bad food at a very expensive price then you will be fine. It is rubbish.

Having visited numerous Hard Rocks over Europe and America, I can easily say that the New York Hard Rock beats all I have been too. The staff are all polite and treat every customer with respect. I would highly recommend visiting while in New York.
Lots of cool music memorabilia throughout the restaurant. Meal and drinks were good. Ordered a couple of their signature drinks with the souvenir glasses.

We had Christmas dinner here last year - kid's choice - and it was very good. Luckily we had booked as there were long queues of people trying to get in. Great service, lovely food and all enjoyed the experience. Would recommend.

Totally enjoyed the place with its great food....great prices and great location in N Y .. Staff were attentive and food God quality. We found it a great stop off as we walked around times square and did the big bus thing for the day.
Walked in with a request for a table of 7. Lovely front of house, table located, food devoured and service attentive. You know what you are going to get and it didn't disappoint
Consistent HRC menu, prep. Great location. Staff nice, attentive. Don't be in a rush if want to wonder/browse the displays.
ribs were awesome..and a huge portion as ell. Loved the decor of all the hanging guitars and large poster size pics of many musicians
No line to get a table about 2pm. Tables were full when we left tho. Food was ok. Really went for the atmosphere. Music. Videos. Memorabilia. Kids liked the shop.
The best food, the best drink and superb Atmosphere. Would definitely visit again and would recommend to friends.
Food wasn't too great but waitress was very nice. The music displays were cool to see but we wouldn't go back.
Has a great vibe and the ribs were awesome,service was good and prices were very fair,I would return
Excellent food, we did not have to wait for long although we were 11 persons on a Friday night. Very nice decoration as well.

column3: Great Food - Great Service - Great Fun
column4: We love the Hard Rock Cafe and visit it whenever we're in NYC. The staff was friendly, and the food was as expected. Thanks for another great experience.
We do like a Hard Rock and the one in Times Sq is probably the best we have eaten in. Both food and service was good, just not quite excellent.
From entering a hub of excitement and music, to the excellent staff and finally amazing food, it was the one place where we thought the staff deserved a gratuity instead of expecting one
We visit hard rock in whichever city we go. Love the atmosphere and food. Although a little pricey we totally think it's worth it. For a relaxed and fun atmosphere it's definitely a place to go!

column3: Very Touristy - but good if that is what you like
column4: We had a decent meal here. It was VERY loud on the inside because it was crowded - which is great for the restaurant. Our food was ok but our server was great!

column3: As usual very noisy , yes it is part of the concept, excellent service and average food.
column4: As an experience for something else in dining... It is worth it! Most of the time just share it in family and birthday parties!
With a great atmosphere, excellent food and service, the Hard Rock Cafe at Times Square is an excellent choice.
Excellent service and great moments spend with my family in this restaurant. Next time in NY will be back.
Busy place, but good service from Janette, whom we discussed antiques with. Nice food and good memorbilla that covers the walls. Drinks were reasonable, it warmed us from the snow.

column3: In the Heart of Time Square
column4: We had a long wait and there was quite a crowd inside the restaurant. The wait staff was very busy and had a difficult time keeping up with customers, making several small mistakes. The food was average and prices high.
The musical memorabilia collection is second to none, great gift shop, with a huge restaurant, can only imagine how cool the place would be if you made it there when there is a live act on the stage.
We had a superb Lunch at Hard Rock Newyork. Service was great by Ms Vivien, food was delicous.. Very good energy at the place!! Thank you guys, hope to see you soon
The waitress and waiters here is bad and very rude. The cocktails was decent. We wanted a table but the said we have to stand I'm the bar.
Good place to visit! good american food and lots of upbeat music and people! On broadway so lively place and famous too!
We went to Hard Rock Cafe for some drinks! Waiter was really good! There was lots of displays which was interesting!
Our visit to the Hard rock cafe in New York, is probably the best visit that we have expirenced ever. The host was great, the food tasted amazing:) Louise and Marco Denmark
Wow service here is top notch. Had great food extra large servings so if theres one thing order only hal as you will be amazed at how big the servings are.
Waiter was very good and made sure all was satisfactory. We ordered a club sandwich and ribs. Enjoyed it.
This place has amazing scenery. The food though was a little bit below expectations. I had ribs and they were overcooked.

column3: Good meal at Hard rock cafe
column4: the food is good and helpings are large at Hard Rock cafe. We go to hard rock cafes of every city that we can and we were not disappointed. Would recommend it highly.
Came here July 4th, love the atmosphere. Not too loud at all. Great food and service. ALOT to see. Great rock n roll history here. It's the 2nd time for me here. I come every time.
The decor and music memorabilia is truly spectacular. The music and atmosphere is very festive. Food is not bad for bar food but wait staff not great. Fun place and nice to see...
What can you expect in the middle of New York. So many people around… The food was ok, hard rock atmosphere and music …
As usuall the first evening in New York we enjoy our dinner at the Hard Rock Cafe. Service and food were great. Thanks again!

column3: Great place for a big group with kids
column4: We had dinner in a big group of 5 adults and 6 children. We all had fun enjoying the food , the music , videos and details of this Restaurant. The location is also great in times square

column3: Hard rock never lets you down!
column4: Gorgeous venue! Really big and spacious, entrance shop & restaurant! Lovely staff, great food as always!
Food and drinks are about the same as in any other Hard Rock. Pretty good, nothing revolutionary. Quite expensive. Staff are friendly and full of energy.
We tried twice to eat here - first time we were told we had to book online, 2nd we were informed they were closing for a private function so we gave up - won't try again.
This is one of the better Hard Rock Cafes. Try the appetizer sampler. It's out of this world and would serve as a lunch for four. Exceptional value for this area.
Popped in here for cocktails, they were very pricey but a great atmosphere and the staff were lovely. Service was very quick and the cocktails were lovely.
Decor is nice and service is good but that's it. Food was below average and shouldn't be this bad considering the prices. Go to Ellen's instead...much better in my opinion.
Good food good at,osphere with live bands Don't have to wait can go to the bar tables and get served straight away. Food is reasonably priced with attentive staff .
We loved it there! We got souvenir s and some great drinks ! My son got a virgin daiquiri and we got the glass to take home!
My wife and l like to view hard rock cafes at every place we travel. We have been to 17 different ones. It was awesome always an enjoyment.
The food was very good with great entertainment. It's very popular for parties. You have to book in advance a table.
Great location for meeting people in the middle of city. Not a quiet setting, but great for having a few drinks
Great spot, Excellent Service, Cheap Beer and the BEST Nachos's going!! Great to get out of the busy streets!! offered Gluten Free as well!!

We have come here many times and enjoy it. It has a good atmosphere and right in the center of Times Square. The food will not disappoint. The restaurant is clean and comfortable. The wait staff has always been good, never had any issues.
As its Hard Rock you have to visit! Service is brilliant as are most places in NYC but make sure you tip! Food was great and the whole interior looked, felt nice!
Food and drinks were wonderful. Our waitress was the best. We had such a great conversation with her. She gave us great advice on places to visit and how to get there. Highly recommended visiting.
Love this place!! The food is absolutely wonderful and the staff is perfectly crazy))) will recommend this place for all of my friends
This is a beautiful Place , the food is excellent and the atmosphere is Cool too. I suggest this restaurant, is so cool( full of important Guitars)

Love to go to the different Hard Rock's around the country. They all have different stuff in them. The food is ok, the service is also ok, depending on when you go, it's pretty busy. I like going and will go back soon!
Noisy place in basement, cocktails just sugar and ice, almost no alcohol. Friendly service though. Seems popular due to name and location but it feels like a rip-off...
I have visited a number of HRC across the world and this one was one of the best. Usual good food and selection of drinks and a massive collection of significant memorabilia.
The service, The food, the atmosphere were all fab. Will happily come back again and recommend to others happily.
If you travel all the way to NYC, don't go to a lame restaurant you can visit anywhere. So many better restaurant options in NYC.
Excellent food reasonable prices and good serving staff , great atmospere with some good memerabelia
The food is terrible not that good of space and horrible service not a good place for family only go there if your goth😂
We went after going to a show. We got appetizers and drinks. Both were very good. we sat at the bar and the service was very good.

Went there with family on a very busy Easter Sunday. Had to wait around 20mins for a table but it was well worth the wait. Food was excellent, cocktails were great and atmosphere fantastic. Waiters, especially Brian, were excellent.

column3: Cool Stuff. Good Food and Service
column4: Very cool to see the CBGB wall in the display case. The food was good. The staff was friendly. Very entertaining meal.

column3: Laid back evening at The Hard Rock
column4: Beers and natchos. You can't beat it! Easy laid back vibe and great service. Sitting at the bar and meeting new people from all around the world. Great night out!
Food is good and service as well.The drinks were tasty.Would like to see more variety in the gift shop.I do go to Hard Rock in any city I'm in where there is a Hard Rock.

This Hard Rock Café is a must see if you are visiting New York. The food is great and the service is always fast and friendly. While you are waiting you can listen to good music and check out the memorabilia.
The hard Rock Cafe is a must place to go for visitors coming to New .York.city for the first time the food there is well prepared to customer satisfaction and the in side is decoratrf

We tried to visit two other restaurants before settling on the Hard Rock and so glad we did. Hakiem waited on us and was such a pleasure to meet and talk with. We had a great time and left with stories and pictures.

Well worth the visit. The memorabilia on show is worth seeing alone and for music fans this is a must visit. We had burger meals which were good albeit a bit more expensive than your average burger restaurant but worth it for the venue.

We eat here just about every time we visit New York City and need a comfort food fix. Love the nachos, buffalo wings, burgers and strawberry basil lemonade! And for desert, the fudge brownie ice cream Sunday is a must!

column3: Good food, good music, good service!
column4: You usually can't go wrong going to a hard rock cafe. You know the selection of food they have is decent no matter which one you go to. Always good music playing, good service, and lots of memorabilia to enjoy.

column3: Great place to visit when in New York
column4: Visited during New York trip. Tasty food, especially the burgers, great service and superb location. Lots of memorabilia for fans to look at. Worth a visit.
Really quick and friendly service, we had the Texan pulled pork burger. It was very tasty! Because it's so good and famous, you have to plan the wait!
Always love coming to hard rocks, the staff is always outgoing the food was good, can never go wrong with mac and cheese. Love the NYC hard rock the memorabilia is amazing

column3: Coming back to HRC on Broadway
column4: Ideally located in downtown Manhattan with the typical food and other stuff that you usually except at HRC.
Good service. Good atmosphere. Yummy food. Hasn't quite got the quirkiness of some other Hard Rock Cafes. We went mid-afternoon - no queues!!
The atmosphere of this place is amazing with all the memorabilia from rock bands. The bar is very nice and wings are great
My husband and I always have at least one Hard Rock Cafe meal whilst travelling overseas. Times Square did not disappoint, with meals reasonably priced and value for money.
This was the first place we ate in NYC and it didn't disappoint. Good portions were good and the drinks even better. Great atmosphere and friendly staff. Live act going on in the back ground too.
Came here once we unpacked, just what we needed after the flight! Staff really friendly too! Amazing!

Food average not too bad the table service is ok but ain't amazing as thought might be but they are usually busy due to the brand n location. Good to grab some merchandise but if you ain't hungry your not missing out on much.
Excellent place to enjoy good music and food...I hope to come back soon...the burgers are amazing and brownie with ice cream should be always the dessert

column3: Fun picture of our group before eating.
column4: Always fun atmosphere when dining at a Hard Rock Cafe. Food was good and service was good. Love the music and videos playing all over the restaurant.
After visiting time square 👍Had too take in hard rock aswell just for atmosphere & great meal Waitress coudnt do enough for us & id highly recommend visiting here

service was very good as expected from a hard rock cafe staff very friendly and helpful food cooked to order this time the music was not to loud so you could still have conversation with your dinner company
As a teen fron the 60's...this place rocks....the music is loud, the atmosphere is giddy and the memorabelia outstanding. Food was good...wai staff helpful...fun, fun place to visit

column3: quality as expected for a Hard Rock Cafe
column4: Probably one of the biggest Hard Rock Cafe's I've visited around the world. Very busy and seemed extremely popular. Service was very good. Food was the usual standards, nothing special.

The place itself was fantastic. Crazy music memorabilia on display (Jim Morrison, Jimi Hendrix, U2, The Beatles etc). The merchandise was priced reasonably. The food was tasty but very fatty. Emphasis on tasty though. Fine service. Would do again.

Expensive, average food with super slow service. Noisy restaurant with nice music memorabilia. I recommend the restaurant if you have a Hard Rock glass collection with major cities visited or are looking for average food with expensive drinks. Fun but better food at other places.

column3: Very good meal with a good beer.
column4: The restaurant is very well located at Times Square - Broadway. Very good food and drinks. The staff is very well trained. We spent very good time there with nice music and fun.
Absolutely love this place. The cocktails are amazing. The food is great. The staff are friendly and always happy to be there. The music always keeps you singing!

column3: First meal in our New York bisit
column4: We had a fully lovely evening from entry to staff service the food the atmosphere and overall good. Only down side is a bit pricey

column3: Best Cosmopolitan I have ever had
column4: Food very tasty, service excellent, background music made for a very pleasant evening with friends. We were able to shop upstairs for suveniers. Not the cheapest night with the cocktails but they were good.
Expensive, no great food, a lot of noise, typical hard rock cafe but here in NY nothing special! I really can't say more

The decor and atmosphere matched the food for me. The waitress was brilliant, very happy and helpful. We wanted to kill a few hours so took our time between courses and this didn't pose any problems. Great food, not posh though.

This place is by far more a tourist attraction than a restaurant. Over priced average quality food, so many better places to eat in New York. I would recommend people avoid this place for food and just go for the pictures.

This place was amazing the food perfect the staff was freindly and couldn't do anymore to help. Also good to look at all the cool things there.the shop had good merchandise at good prices will be going back
Excellent visit to Hard Rock Cafe with very good food, great service and surroundings as expected. Fajitas were excellent as were the burgers and steak. Well worth a visit!!

column3: Good place to take the family for lunch when visiting
column4: Good place to take the family for lunch when visiting. Kids (of all ages) enjoy the R&R memorabilia. The service is good so you can get back to afternoon activities soon, after a nice break with good food.
The big screen videos are awesome. The staff is very friendly and helpful on tips in the big city. The food was great as well as the drinks. Very nice bar area.
Loved this hotel. Huge variety of cuisine. Good food and drinks. Loved the picture taken with guitar. Thanks guys... This restaurant is located in famous Times Square of New York City.

column3: Service good; food not so much
column4: Food was not very appealing. I think it's just tired. They need a re-do. Call Gordon Ramsey. ;) Our server was very friendly and professional. I enjoyed the old videos while eating.
So expensive for what you get!! 11dollars for a glass of house white. 21dollars for a burger 🍔 it's the name your paying for. The one good thing was the staff who were very friendly.

Have eaten in many restaurants around the world and found this restaurant matched standard and service. The waitress was very attentive and the food was of decent standard. If I was in the area I would revisit.
Thought the service was very good, food was great, didn't have to wait long for our food, was always asked if they could get us anything, worth the money
We found the hard rock café and decided to go and have breakfast. Food was not the best, but a good place to go and look a the memorabilia and have a drink.

Food was good, atmosphere was good. Not too long a wait ( it was superbowl Sunday though and they were not showing the game ) For the money, the food was good, service too was good. Would recommend for a bite to eat.
