Food is lousy, poor quality and cold on the plate. service is average. it is so large and crowded that the noise is impossible. cannot keep conversation at the table. not that we were eager to talk. hungry in, hungry out as nobody was able to finish their plate it was that bad.
Had dinner at Hard Rock Cafe. The spinach Burger was delicious, Ambiance nice-Good service-Quick and very friendly.
As always really enjoyed our visit to Hard Rock Cafe the meal and atmosphere were great the waiter was excellent !

The food was ok, tipical of casual dinners. But the service was excellent, made us feel very welcomed. As for waiting time, it is times square so you probably going to have to wait. But in my experience i didn't have a long waiting time.
Was sceptical before hand thinking this would be all show and no substance. How mistaken I was the starters were so huge we struggled to eat the main courses.

After our dismal experience at Planet Hollywood we were slightly concerned about eating here... these were completely unfounded. It was great. Lovely staff, good atmosphere, great food and a truly NYC experience. Would go back again

Called in on a very cold morning for a hot breakfast buffet. Fresh food, although not a huge choice, efficient service and certainly didn't feel rushed (although difficult to believe you ever would on a cold February morning.)

As always the Hard Rock Cafe was nicely decorated. The bathrooms were clean! The food was delicious and there was plenty of it! However, don't ever order water unless you prefer drinking salty water. Yuk!

Every hard rock I've ever eaten in has had delicious food. We were not disappointed. Very busy place so go ahead of the dinner crowd, we got there around 5 and did not have to wait very long, 10 mins. Buy a tshirt.
Good food at a reasonable price and a great location on Times Square. Music wasn't too loud which is a good thing if you ask me.

When you go to any Hard Rock Cafe, you expect a level of it being over commercial. The service, food and drinks however were good and the food was reasonably priced. We had to have a repeat visit as it was enjoyed so much.
So many historic things to see and the staff were excellent. The food and drinks were amazing as well and we got a lot of food for our money.

We arrived and had to wait about 10 minutes for a table. Once we were shown to our table the waitress was very friendly and service was good. The food and cocktails were good and all in all we had a good night out!
Don't miss burger here if you are at ny. Good steak also!!!! And good music....great atmosphere...good location....great reputation...

We have been to NYC a couple of times and kept meaning to eat at the Hard Rock, finally got here this time and wasn't disappointed. Food was great, staff were great, wait was about ten minutes which wasn't to bad.
There was a little wait for a table but worth it!! The food was yummy and the service was friendly and fast!!
Standard fare... Although nothing in particular wrong with food, unless visiting for novelty value when in NYC eat elsewhere! Not the usual Hard Rock vibe

column3: Food not good but very entertaining.
column4: Ordered the jumbo combo & a salad, the jumbo combo was colder than the salad. The bartender was very entertaining and all of the Hard Rock Cafe decorations were very nice.
good atmosphere but food very rushed and very average not worth the wait - tried 3 days to get in Plant Hollywood much better

100% better than over the road at Planet Hollywood. Music better, food better, service better, everything better. Grabbed a bargain as well due to having 30% off at the time. Would love to visit again and stay longer

I like this place the server was great wait was long and they were busy the food is great wife and family are French they are sticky about there food , are there words where great , so I loved my food
As in all Hard Rock Cafe the food is excellent. A bit of wait (unless you are a VIP member) but well worth the wait

Both dined for breakfast and dinner........17dollars all u can eat buffet breakfast amazing......and for dinner the best steak I've eaten yes you may have to wait for a table but worth every mouthful highly recommended !!!!!
This restaurant is high! We love Hard Rock Cafés and NYC was not disappointing. Definitely worth a visit!

I've been here many, many times. It's our fall back when we can't decide where else to go. Good food, great ambiance and very nice staff. Definitely recommend to anyone visiting NYC. It's a great experience at least once in your lifetime.

column3: As expected from a hard rock
column4: The food Is great can't really go wrong as it's the same menu every where. Service was good but not great. It seamed to be a bit unorganised when you first arrive and are waiting to be seated.
Iconic restaurant in an iconic area. Great food and friendly service and some interesting memorabilia in this New York branch. Loved the burger and enjoyed the ambience
For anybody who loves great Rock N Roll music and good food this is an experience not to be missed. If you are in New York don't miss this experience.
Had a lovely breakfast here in Dec 13, buffet breakfast eat all you like. The maple syrup sausages were to die for! Wish we had eaten here previously to our last day. Free Wifi too!
We been there for dinner and found this place very good. Food, drinks , preparation, taste , ambience, everything was great. love to come back again,
Thought this would be all hype but I was wrong. Brilliant atmosphere and friendly staff who are entertaining to boot. Food and cocktails were tasty beyond belief. Would definitely recommend

column3: Excellent atmosphere but remortgage the house!
column4: A long queue for tables with an hour wait - not surprising. The food was excellent and plentiful, the service very polite and efficient but VERY expensive for burger and chips!
Once again the Hard Rock NYC did not disappoint, great food and extremely good service. Would recommend this for anyone visiting New York.

Very disappointed this time round - food came out freezing cold (twice) both the starter and the mains Hopefully was just a blip as have eaten at other hard rock cafés and never had an issue before the food is normally good!
We had an early dinner and was able to get immediate sitting at the bar. Staff was friendly and attentive. Pricing was fair based on where we are. I would definitely come back!

column3: Waste of time (and lots of it)
column4: Went with our three kids. Waited in line for about forty five minutes. When we finally made it in, service was so-so. Food was more greasy and diner-level. All in all - would not go again, in spite of the nice decor and atmosphere.
Went one evening, was fairly busy and a fun, upbeat atmosphere. Love all the memorabilia and music. Food was ok and the service not too bad, it was pretty busy but the waiter was good fun.
We waited a little bit (20 minutes) but leveraged the opportuntiy to have a coktail at the bar (great Mojito :-)) and then we enjoyed a nice burger with great music and great R&R items to look at.
Nice location, nice friendly staff, average food. Interesting artefacts on the walls though worth a try.
Servers were nice but service was a bit slow. Food was average. Memorabilia was the best part of the place. Get there early to beat the lines.
Four of us went to The Hard Rock at Time Square, good experience, good food . Everyone enjoyed the night out and also the desert was great.

We went when in New York out of curiosity. To go to the various/restaurant you must go downstairs. For drunks only you must sit around the bar. It is dark inside with lots of bright lights, but a good atmosphere with drinks reasonably priced.

column3: One of the best restaurants in NYC.
column4: Wonderful atmosphere, awesome food and very welcoming staff. One of the best places in New York. I'll certainly be back!
Times Square-Hard Rock Cafe in october 2013. The hamburgers were delicious. The waiting time for a table 20 mins but so worth it.
Two rounds of drinks $60! No wonder the drinks menu doesn't have prices on. Food was OK though but nothing special.

Perfect restaurant, fun and great food. Had a variety of food even for vegetarians and the energy was great. Lots of entertainment and all the waiters and waitresses were always happy. The meals were really big though for someone from the UK!!

column3: Not your typical H. Rock experience car
column4: I've been to many around the world and for a great city like NY, I'd expected a little bit more 'bang'! Mild music, under-welmed by the service and mood in the place!
I had margaritas and they were excellent the staff was nice and very friendly i ordered take away and the food was great. I love the way the place is so nice clean and huge!

column3: Love all the memorbilia, wall of guitars, pics & motorcycles
column4: The wait time is long, so we went to the bar. One drink walking around enjoying all the Elton John costumes, many guitars,pictures & motorcycles. Lots of things and people to look at. Did not eat. But this was an interesting stop along the way.

The food was lovely, yet somewhat overpriced. Considering the size of portions you can get in other restaurants for half the price then its not as good as what people make out. The food if decent though.

Fun atmosphere, excellent service, delicious food and drinks!! Slight wait to be seated, as to be expected!! Portions here are huge, so we did waste a fair bit of food!! Going back in Jan 2014 and this is on our list to visit again!!!
What can you say! Fun atmosphere,great service,delicious food and drinks and the gift shop! Nuff said!
Looking for a place with great music, authentic pieces of the greatest artists in pop history, and combine this with great drinks , great food and a cool staff, then hey , let's ROCK &ROLL

Bar manager Smokey... We ate here 4/5 times and on our first visit met Smokey the bar manager, unbelievably helpful and friendly and every time we went back we didn't have to que and got served straight away.. Thank you smokey!

If you know what a Hard Rock Café is like, this is the same. Their store is worth a stop at even if you don't eat there because they have nice pins unique to NYC that are always changing and updating. Convenient to Times Square.
Had lunch there as I was told it was an original building however it has been updated. Typical hard rock care.

We have been in Hard Rock Cafes all around the world and was expecting the one in NYC to be quite special. We were disappointed in the memorabilia, and the food was only average. Would not bother again.
This HRC is very large and the dining area is underground. The food is delicious and portions are generous. The ambience is terrific...enjoy great music and a great vibe while taking a food break.
What a night in the 'OLD' Hard Rock cafe. Food was terriffic, staff very friendly and the music was great, even had a dance!!!
I liked the welcome friendly staff, the big wide place and tables, with quiet lights & Music. The menu was covering all types of food. I choose grilled Salmon with rice & vegetables. It was tasty.
food was great as always, luv seeing the music decor... we got in and out quite quickly... have visited many hard rocks NYC one of my favorites

column3: Great food in a nice atmosphere
column4: This place has huge dishes. The food is great and the atmosphere is nice. Waiting to be sitted is not that bad, since you get a kind of a pager and you get to browse around in the meantime. The service was great.
Amazing food, came here with mates and really enjoyed it. the portions are huge (not complaining) and had a great time. service was also great! :)
It´s a legendary place, everything inside it is unique, and the typical american fast food is so yummy! loved it
Great atmosphere, okay service, okay food although portions were huge. An obvious must if you're visiting NYC but it's more for the atmosphere than the food.

I went here in June 2012 on a school trip and its a trip that I will deinitely never forget. The atmosphere was brilliant and the staff were really nice, they even took pictures with us. I would highly recommend this place!
The food is always good! Drinks are very nice (they do not dissolve the alcohol!!) Service is very well oriented on Customer. It is not a cheap restaurant, but really Worth it!!
I visited this Hard Rock Cafe twice on my recent visit to NYC and the food was great, not to mention good value, on both occasions. The exhibits were pretty good too,
Food was amazing, great atmosphere and friendly staff! Got to take the glass away as a sovenier too, which was lovely! Hard Rock Cafe shop upstairs too.
Brilliant atmosphere, staff were lovely but it appeared to be too busy for the amount of staff on as food was average and waited forever.

Visited in Nov 11 & Mar 12 and both times the food was excellent and plentiful, the service was great and the overall experience was brilliant. The atmosphere was electric within the restaurant, very good exhibits to wander round and look at.

The kids wanted to try this one because they had never been to this location. Everything was just average in both food and service. We were there pretty late so perhaps the time has something to do with it. In a pinch, worth the time.
This famous café proposed unforgettable atmosphere, tasty dishes, good service and unexpectable reasonable prices. We were 5 hungry adults and finished with drinks and fully loaded at about 120$.
Great food, we had nachos and their special dish of different appetizers. They decorated the place so well and everyone was sooo friendly. loved the place
Good food, great place, great staff, reasonable prices. But be prepared to wait, nothing is perfect. Will be back for sure!

There's no place for me as the Hard Rock Cafe's around the worls. But this one in NY is special. Loved the decoration, the food (Mac and Cheese and Burgers) and the staff. Wanna come back again some day!
The hard Rock on Times Square was a great place to eat, and our waiter gave us the background on all the special concerts that they have at this venue. Lot of great memorabilia.
Awesome restaurant, not tourist trap at all. Good food, great place, nice staff, reasonable prices. But be prepared to wait, nothing is perfect.

Good food, not too expensive. Service was ok. We had to wait 30 minutes for our table and there was a whole section with open tables. apperently lack of servers. Not back if you want to have a lunch in Time Square.
Great location in Times Square, had to wait for about 30 minutes, service was good, food was great, good atmosphere
it was simple and sweet! drinks were good. food was delicious it is location at the center of Times Square.
As all HRC the food, music and ambient is great and at the same time it`s like eating in a museum. Just take look around the different guitars, dresses, albums and other artefacts.
Lovely food and service as you would expect. Given a bleeper so we could shop while waiting for a table which was good.

We had some good burgers here, the ambience is also very good. There was this long wait, but I guess it's always like that. The hostesses weren't in a good mood, but the waitress made up for that providing good service.
We visited the time square one and had pizza lam i know but it was good and we had a doggy bag to go too as we couldn't finsh it
We had a great server (2 actually), and they took care of us. It is a good thing to get the featured drink with glass. The Salad was AWESOME!!! Great service and food is where it is at!!!
Really enjoyed touring the pictures and memorabilia on the walls. The wait to be seated wasn't long and service was great once seated. The food and cocktails were delicious.

It was busy, however worth it. Never before have I been somewhere to eat where there is also so much to look at! The food was great, the atmosphere is wonderful, best possible location, couldn't really ask for any more!

We had a great time eating here. I have three kids and they really enjoyed it, as this was our first trip to NYC. Loved the atmosphere, service, and food. You may have to wait to be seated, but it is worth it. Great experience!

column3: Easy Time at The Hard Rock Cafe
column4: ! always like to visit The Hard Rock Cafe, as I know I am going to get a great meal & service. Visited twice this time, and it was great. Music Rocks!

Just like every other Hard Rock Cafe, food is great, atmosphere is amazing and the service is the best!...The waiting line was huge, but it is Manhattan, no surprise for me....went to the bar instead of a table.
We've been there some times and its always a good experience. Lines are long but move quite fast The only problem is the strong air conditioning so bring a warm sweater or something like that

column3: Go for atmosphere not for food
column4: Food was very expensive for just average meal. Nice atmosphere long wait very crowded They have a electronic board where your name goes to see when table will be ready
line was long, food was terrible and waiter forgot our food and brought it to a different table.. Not worth iit.

column3: Not the best one I have been too but was my daughters first experience & they loved it.
column4: Service was excellent & it was a Saturday eve so was impressed that we did not have to wait tooo long. Thought it was good value for mocksails & the free glass. Pleased I went as after all it was NYC.
Crowded! Sits at the bar require ID! No ID no sit at the bar. Not that friendly as other HRC I've been. Merchandise was good.

The decor of course is awesome...the food was very good...I liked the fact that you could see how many calories were in the dish. Our server was very happy, polite and enthusiastic! I would definately recommend stopping in for a bite to eat!
The service was great and nothing to complain. This is the biggest HRC I have been. The price is slightly expensive than other HR but what to expect is NYC.

Food was delicious, and the service was great. My wife and two teenage children had burgers, and I had a delicious soup and salad. It was yummy. I might add that the atmosphere was great. Really enjoyed our time there.
Tasty place to eat, situated below the fantastic Times Square - this is somewhere you should check out while you are in the neighbourhood!

Although you have to wait awhile it is well worth it. Sandwiches,burgers just to name many of the extensive items on there menu. Very clean.And we'll decorated.many items to buy,such as shirts,key chains etc. When coming to New York this is a must!
My son is a HR pin collector, so we headed there to get his pin. We've been to many Hard Rocks and the one in Times Square is very cool!
The service here was excellent. There was no waiting. The server was very informative and attentive to our needs. The food as well was excellent. Would definitely return.
On arriving a queue greeted us our name was taken and put on a board when your name transfered to the other board it was your time to be seated. The food was ok and the service fine, very busy!

column3: Must go place in New York
column4: I visit Hard Rock Cafe all over the world and New York Hard Rock Cafe stays the best !!! I literally can spend there a whole day and the exibiion always has something new. I love this place and people working there are the coolest!
Service was good, cocktails were excellent and you get to keep your glass, food was ok, a little bit like fast food, ok if you want to east on the run, place was huge.

column3: Typical Hard Rock in great spot
column4: As expected the place was pretty busy but was no detriment to our experience & service (thanks to the lovely Carlene) and the quality of food. Great menu & huge portions.. food & cocktails :-D
burgers huge. very nice. very helpful staff. good disabled access. tasty food. music not too loud. great place
Debbie was our server and She had lots of personality. burgers were cooked as we ordered. beer was cold. Trace Adkins Show was the best! meeting him backstage- Priceless!
Great food and service, coffee was strong just the way I like it :) Great atmosphere and the store on upper level was fun to browse in after dinner.

column3: Typical Hard Rock but in NY
column4: The food was good, service average but the décor was typical Hard Rock with many interesting items from all avenues of the music world. Lights low music loud.

Very large cocktails brilliant bar staff didn't eat here but wanted o visit and see the me memorabilia wasn't let down every wall had something amazing on it either guitar clothing photos the Beatles suits and TWA travel bags was on display enough said ...
Last day of our hols , waited about 10 -15 mins Food was lovely , good selection of minerals , proper home cooked meals , not just chips & burgers , Waitress was really sweet

column3: Fun Food and never fail decor
column4: I impress my teen son with my knowledge of Led Zeppelin! Even he notices the Guitar on the wall. Fun, good Rock & Roll with Americana food. They should have Super Bands Theme nights!
Staff was very friendly. Didn't have to wait in line for a table and the service was fast. Had a great store to buy merchandise and cost was very reasonable.

column3: Food very average but a good atmosphere
column4: We waited a long time for a table then we waited an even Longer time for the food which was really disappointing to be honest. It is a cool place and a good atmosphere but you are just paying for the brand name.
We always visit a Hard Rock when there is one close. As usual the service, food, atmosphere, etc. was outstanding. When in NYC area again will definitely be dining here again.
This is a Rockk Bar.! Delicious Burgers, cold beers, friendly stuff. Relax and enjoy your day.! Thanks.
Very interesting memoirabilia. Food and service very good. Convenient to Times Square andvarious attractions.

column3: About what I expected, but better service.
column4: The food was good, we had no wait. Our waiter was attentive and friendly and was great with the kids. We would go back.
Ate here twice while in NY. Both times were really good. I like hard rock anyway but it was a wonderful atmosphere and the food was fresh and great . Derek, our waiter on the 1st night was very nice.
Have now had 2 lunches there this week and both have been great. Service has been quick and friendly. Food Good.
Brilliant atmosphere, brilliant cocktails, excellent service, yummy food, plenty of choice...don't have a starter even to share if you want to enjoy your mains as the portions are huge....
Catch it at the right time so you don't have to queue (before 12pm or around 5pm) and it's fab. It's of a type and food at it.
Almost like a concert. You are there to see the glassed in articles and photos and not there for a romantic meal. Drinks were good and the meal was OK. Nothing to really get excited about.
Have been to lots of Hard Rock Cafe's over the world however the NYC Hard Rock is definitely the best! A must visit while in New York!

column3: Buy your Pin, go elsewhere to eat.
column4: I like collecting he awesome Hard Rock pins, but the food and service is horrible. In NYC, choose somewhere els to eat.
Food good gotta try chicken tenders in heavy metal sauce . Burgers good too. Services was fast ans efficient

excellent service and food was great, very busy restaurant but the guys are all friendly under extreme pressure. Food was served very quick and was yummy, photo's are available if requested and shop is available for hard rock gifts
Very nice place for lunch with 4 kids ages 12, 14, 17, 18! Came at 12:30 PM - lo line - godd good - good service.

For such a busy place the service was brilliant. Very friendly and very knowledgable staff on the menus etc. brilliant with the children both staff and child friendly menu an obviously like all Hard Rock Cafes the decor is outstanding.
Very nice staff and food, the atmosphere in there was very nice. would recommend. The food was very quick and was all fresh and quality.

Food was excellent as was the service They do not however accept bookings so you have to hang around for 30 minutes until your table is ready. Well worth a visit and overall cost was very reasonable. Would definitely return.

We always go to hrc's whenever we vacation near one... Touristy I know, but its a tradition! We always get yummy food and great service and the NYC location was no exception. We had lots of fun and can't wait to come back!
We took my nephew to this place for his 10th birthday. They had him stand in his chair and hold his birthday sundae while everyone yelled "Happy Birthday." Food is okay for the venue.
the food is on the pricey side but thats expected in new york. the food is nice though and huge portions.

column3: Great food with a great atmosphere
column4: We went along as a family of four and had a great meal with first class waiters/waitresses who were very attentive. All of us said how we had enjoyed the food and the atmosphere.
Wonderfully vibrant place, so many artefacts to see and delicious food. Just be prepared to wait a while for a table as it's busy ALL the time.

column3: Good Customer Service at the Bar
column4: We stopped in the Hard Rock for a drink before going to the Lion King. The service at the bar was excellent. The drinks were a little light in the alcohol. The bar measures each pore. Fun with fast friendly service.
Lovely meal, nice to take time to look around at the memorabilia. Book in this country first to avoid BIG queues.
Visited here on our first evening in New York, and enjoyed the food and atmosphere. It's definitely worth a visit just to say you've been and to see all the memorabilia.

column3: Hard To Beat the Hard Rock Rythmn
column4: Lively atmosphere and close to Times Square are words the tourist wants to hear. You will wait some to be seated, but it will be worth the "times" well spent. The Asian BBQ was a great taste with a little heat.

column3: Hard Rock Cafe at Yankee Stadium
column4: Ate here after Yankee Stadium Tour......not the best Hard Rock I've been to but fair and conveniently attached to Yankee Stadium.

My daughter wanted to go here during our vacation in New York, I had low expectations as it's a chain restaurant but how wrong was I !! Great food, reasonably priced and quick service would definitely recommend.

column3: probably one of the most interesting HRC
column4: Went there for dinner and spent my time at the bar. There are probably more articles of artists on display than in many other HRC. Friendly waiter, nice atmosphere, food as good as always.

I think this is one of those gotta go to places when in New York, food was nice, simple burgers chicken wings ect, but the waiter was really friendly and helpful, place was a little cramped but would defiantly recommend.
Even though it't a chain, we went here and were not disappointed. The guitars in the foyer and all around the restaurant and the rock and roll history really add to the place. Good American food too.
We got in right away, no wait. Waiter was very nice. Atmosphere was a lot of fun!! Very busy place. Food was ok.
The staff was friendly and the food was good. The gift shop was fun to look around and there were some fun places to take pictures and be a tourist.
We were told the wait for a table was an hour but we were seated within 30 minutes. The staff were friendly and there was a good atmosphere. The food was better than we expected.

column3: Lunch after a cold day out
column4: the food was very good, and the customer service was first class Would i eat there again - of course
We had ribs and a burger. The food was fair and the service was good but there are alot of better places to eat.

great atmosphere great food ypu must try it and make sure you try the burgers its thier speciality i also recommend it day or night time really great experince friendly people....i tried thier chicken wings and bos burgers wow they rock
the food was good but it's very expensive and you have to wait a lot before eating. Probably people go there just to say: "I've been there"

column3: Good food right in Times Square!
column4: Went there twice, once in a group of four for dinner and drinks and everything was great! And went with group of 10 for drinks at bar and they were great but some complained too strong! But nice bar atmosphere and regular bar by prices

Great Service, amazing food,, a must to visit.. In the middle of Times Square a great stop off to fill the belly after all the shopping and sightseeing. The staff are real friendly and attend to your every need.
Food was great, big portions!! the atmosphere was really good and the price was very reasonable considering it is the Hard Rock Cafe!
I have been to NYC 2 times. I went to Hard Rock Cafe 2 times. We always love it. It is great & fun. Food & Services were very good. I will recommend it to my friends.

column3: Guaranteed good food and great atmosphere.
column4: Went here twice out of 5 nights. Both the older and younger members of our group loved the atmosphere. The food is comfort food which was good after a days full trekking and the quality can always be relied on. Service - good as standard.

column3: Not just a meal, so much more!
column4: Whilst the food here is very good, that's only part of the reason that you might want to come here. The memorabillia is everywhere, the atmosphere is brilliant, and the music and videos were very nostaligic and hard to take your eyes off
Excelent place I just love the hard rock cafe,the service was excellent our waitress made sure our drinks where filled at all times.
hard rock cafe in new york is just like any other hard rock cafe, if you like them you will have a good time.

Great place to eat in New York City. They have a wide range of American food, loud music, fun atmosphere, and great waitresses. My kids love going to Hard Rock, watching the music videos, eating burgers, chicken fingers, Mac n cheese and desserts.
Food was good. Not great. The service was fantastic. Loved all the memorabilia! It was my first visit to a Hard Rock Cafe. What better then time square.
A collection of musical memorobilia from around the world with a central located bar, friendly staff and great food.
Atmosphere was exactly as expected (even though restaurant is in lower level). Sandwiches were good and very reasonably priced. Service was great.

column3: A bit of a wait but worth it
column4: About an hour's wait to eat at 5pm but the food was good and the server (Mel) was very attentive. As usual there is lots going on at a HRC but the Beatles display was a bit special
Went for a relaxed dinner and it certainly was. Food was very good quality and the staff are all friendly and quintessentially charming,

column3: What's not to like? It's the Hard Rock!
column4: Very crowded, but wait was not too long. Location at Time Square. Service is great, friendly, what you expect from the HRC. Good selection of pins , shirts, etc.
Nothing to dislike here, the atmosphere was brilliant. The music was FAB, the food was gorgeous. Good choice of food and great service.
I`ve been in a few HRC all over the world as I`m a glass collector, but this one, from NYC, is the most amazing HRC :x
We visited twice for the breakfast buffet while staying in New York. Very good value, and a great start to the day!
i loved eating here, the coctails were to die for and the nachos were amazing. The decor and atmosphere were fantastic and the staff and food were good too
We went there after Mama mia show, It was late but they found place for us after 5min. Grat nachos, grat steak, great burger.
food was grand slightly cold, and was slightly cold where we were sitting. staff were friendly. not waiting time at all.

We went to the Hard Rock cafe with friends when we visited Yankee Stadium. The food was really good but true to it's name it was rockin! Good tunes but not easy to hear your buddies when they are talking to you! Very good value!

I always enjoy going to the Hard Rock Cafe's. I've been to their Times Square, Las Vegas, Phoenix, Orlando, Yankee Stadium and Chicago sites and they are all very consistent. I really love seeing all the rock memorabilia. The food is always good too.
We had a lovely meal here, service & food excellent. It has a great atmosphere, can be quite expensive but then you are in Times Square.

Long lines. Good service. Great beers. Being a franchise, the restaurant is the same all over the world, but still a very good restaurant. With so many excellent restaurants in NY, this should be considered one of the last options.

You know what to expect for. The nice staff, good and well served food, great videos and music, vintage acessories from the "stars" and the shop to add one more item to your collection. Great ambient!

Food was good. Sat at the bar as waiting time for a table was over 45 minutes. BBQ combo was really nice although the ribs were not falling of the bone! Waiting time for food has improved since last time but the fries were cold.

What a great place to eat. Love the atmosphere, the food and the whole experience. Go early to avoid line-ups as there is always a wait. The food was great and I will definitely go back. LOVE LOVE LOVE
Eat early if you can. Ordered nachos as a starter for four of us - didn't really need anything to eat after that! It's something that you have to do and not bad value for money.
Went for a few drinks at the end of the evening, unplanned and we really enjoyed it. The staff were so friendly it made the evening. Prices were great too.

Smack bang in the centre of Times Square and good for nipping in for a cocktail and chilling out and for some fast food (hard rock style!!!!) Just a typical Hard Rock - nothing to write home about!!! Good Cosmopolitons!!!
every place we go, we make sure we goto Hard Rock cafe if they have one. this one in New York is really neat but expensive (new york pricing) but was great service and food.
Vibrant large dining area, alongside a well and slick run bar.The wall of guitar's coming down the stairs, is some sight.Amazing to feel so safe in such a hectic popular space.
This is an average place to eat. The memorabilia is interesting. Ask for a booth when booking your table, you see a lot more of the memorabilia than seating a a table

column3: Always a lively place to visit
column4: Hard Rock presents a great atmosphere - great for Rock lovers. Good food - great selection - reasonable prices. Always consistent.
It truely is a nice stop especially if your guests have naver been to a Hard Rock. I personally think it's the best of the best of the Hard Rock's!1

column3: maybe average to good - bit chilly
column4: food and beer was good, atmosphere is great as you'd expect, service was a bit slow to begin with but perked up. I am used to a/c but this place was just a bit on the cool side. Would I return - maybe.
We love Hard Rock Cafe whether in London, Barcelona or New York, this place has amazing energy and the staff offer great service
Great food and service. Would definitely recommend the chocolate brownie!!!! Another plus is the constant flows of refills on any fizzy soft drinks
Loved the atmosphere, loved being able to get a seat at the bar to sit and watch the world. Drinks were amazing!

One of the best HRC I've visited. Right at Times Square. Although the waiting time was little long, however given the location, it was worth it. The food was delicious and the ambiance rocking. And yes, the charges were pretty decent.
We stayed in NY four days and went twice to HR Cafe. Always had great hamburgers and an excellent Texas Sandwich. Service very friendly but may be too much inclined towards gratuities.

column3: A family place in the middle of Broadway
column4: Decent food, but not great. Fair prices, kid friendly. Altogether a decent place for a quick lunch in the theater district.
Server was rushed you could tell, but did a good job. Eggs were a bit runny but the pancake dippers and sausages we're good. 40 bucks for breakfast is a bit steep tho.

Late night post Broadway theatre dinner and service and food was excellent even at that late hour. Our waiter was attentive and helpful even going to the store to pick up our purchases for us. Atmosphere was lively and fun.
If you're a Hard Rock fan, you won't be disappointed. It does get busy plan for up to an hour wait for a table.
Wanted to experience Hard Rock NYC so we hand a few drinks; overall not to bad; we were surprised and disappointed that ALL food service ends at 1am.

The atmosphere was great baseball showing on the TV, music blaring...potato skins what else can you ask for. A real authentic American night out. Great! The barman who placed the SPOON N FORK drums so was so cool!
Excellent service - food was fresh and plentiful like all American restaurants - great cocktails - given a free glass for each drink you buy - souvenirs are great
Hard Rock cafe is downstairs, A great place to pop into before going to the Theatre for a cocktail & photo. My Mojito was a bit strong so leave plenty of time to drink.
Another theme restaurant that you must visit. It has loads of memorabilia that keeps you amused while you much away on your usuall pizza, ribs etc
We got seated right away on a Saturday, late afternoon. Good sized portions and delicious food. Good service also. Food is not like most chain places, worth it, even though it is touristy.

Expected an expensive, rushed meal in this Times Square located restaurant. Found it friendly, spacious with good food, excellent decor (as ever with HRC) and decent value. Good beers on draft. Very pleasantly surprised.
Went to the Hard Rock Cafe at Yankee Stadium with my family and was surprised by the food and the service, it was great! Will go again.

Right on Times Square so it gets busy. The food is good and not too expensive. The staff are attentive. Lots of great items to look at - I particularly like The Beatles suits and flight bags. Worth a visit.

First night in New York? Go to Times Square after a beer in Bryant Park and go to the Hard Rock Cafe. Its Legendary Burger is unbeatable - beautifully cooked rare burger with home-fries and salad, great value for your $15.
I had a wonderful experience at the Hard Rock. Service was great, food was excellent. The restaurant is run very well! I love the atmosphere and look forward to going back!
Visited in April 2012. Excellent service, lovely food and brilliant atmosphere! Total tourist trap but we loved it! Friendly staff and good service!

The service was great, but the food was mediocre at best. Very disappointing. It was so chilly in the restaurant that we couldn't wait to get outside. If you like fast food, a chilly environment then this is the place for you.
good place right at the edge of times square to get a drink and always a great place to see all the people.

column3: Even If You Visit Only Once, Visit
column4: Its loud, its pricey and the food is just above average but its Hard Rock Cafe Times Square New York. Obviously a must for fans of certain genres of music and music memorabilia but some of the exhibits will astound non music memorabilia fans.

column3: Never fails to please- Times Square Branch
column4: I eat at Hard Rocks everywhere as I like the fact that I know hat I am getting. My favorite meal is the pulled pork sandwich. The brand standard of this restaurant chain is second to none.

Went here as a family. Food prices were as expected and not that outrageous. A family of 4 cost approx. $80 and that included alcohol and a glass to take home. The food was very good and the portion sizes were huge!
Food was ok and drinks were expensive. Very large but not very clean. Good if you are in a rush and want a place to feed the kids near the the theatre district.

The restaurant is your typical Hard Rock but our server, "The Pin Man" was awesome. A little pricey for "bar food" though. We were seated rather quickly and our server was very responsive to all our needs.
The California burger was awesome, and the drinks as well! Worth a visit. For only 10 dollars you get a souvenir glass (included drink) as well!
was ok staff wasnt the friendlist food was just ok planet holiday much better the atmoshere was good but we had a long wait to which we did expect

We expected to have to wait in line like everywhere in the US of A - but despite large queues for smaller tables - ours was ready straight away. Great Service, great food, great atmosphere and of course, great music
The food was good. Staff was (as usual) quite attentive and helpful. They even arranged a Birthday Sundae for our group leader who was celebrating a birthday.

column3: Nice restaurant while in NYC with family
column4: Kids love this place when we are in NYC, lots a fun items to looks at, and in the middle of Times Square
Meal was ok but wife's chicken was undercooked. Your really paying for the name and location. Better to find elsewhere and less crowded, especially with people walking around looking at the walls.

I was there visiting NY and the place is great, the service very friendly and the food was delicious! The milkshake awsome! And the brushetas so yummy! The price like the others a little overpriced, but you must go there, the environment is very nice.
The restaurant was crowded, average food overpriced - long wait for table and food
Major queues, at least an hours wait for a table at night
great food and wonderful place to go to eat and listen music
We have visited many Hard Rock Cafes. I think they pretty much are all the same. We make it a point to visit if there is one near our destination. We enjoy collecting HRC tshirts and pins.
How could one not love this place Always a seat at the bar Great service and music Convenient restrooms
Service was great, food always good, and great music, atmosphere. Great for the entire family at lunch or dinner. We happen to eat there 2 days out of 4 day trip, and the kids loved it.
Love this place good food Great atmosphere Love all the memorabilia
Overpriced and line is too long. Food was average at best. Service is ok.
You seen one you've seen them all not much on this type of stop but traveling with family you go with the majority
Friendly staff and decent food, plentiful as you would expect in NY.
Never been to HRC before, great service matched by great food and atmosphere. Kids loved it too. Can recommend for families.
Good food - good service - good atmosphere - not pushing for tips - not rushed - never had a bad experience at the Hard Rock
If you have young teenagers in town on a visit, ok! Frankly the food was not bad, the servers were fun, and the space ... well it IS a Hard Rock Cafe.
We ordered the steak which was delicious although a tad pricey. It was also a bit loud compared to the other hard rock cafes we've visited. Interesting layout in an old theater

column3: Like any other in the world
column4: Nice decoration. Liked the guitars in the wall when you get downstairs. Good food...but the chicken fingers were soooo spicy I could barely eat them! They have to improve their cocktails...worst mojito ever, but loved the Southern Rock.
Not the best HardRock I have been in Orlando the best - service good - food average, surroundings poor
We were surprised how few people eat breakfast there. Not the greatest food, but good value and plenty of it. Plus you get the place to yourself to wander round and look at the memorabilia.
Wait staff was attentive. Food was better than expected, we were there for a light lunch. A little of a wait but the climb up the stairs had lots to look at.
I'm not crazy about branch restaurants, but I'm pleased with my visits this Hard Rock. I have no complaints at all about this location. Everything meet my very high standards.

column3: Went more for the brand and not for the food
column4: Maybe i assumed that it was going to be something greater than it was. You're paying for the chain food brand but not for the food....
I love going into this place for a look around especially the massive guitar on the ceiling
While we were in NY, we went at least 6 or 7 times out of 10 nights. They definitely make the best cocktails and the staff is incredibly sweet and helpful.

No queue and went straight in. The air conditioning was way to low and it was freezing. Our waitress was very good though and tried hard to please. The food was average and the atmosphere was lacking. Have been in better Hard Rock cafes.
Large space for a private event, food stations were average.

We love the NYC Hard Rock. It is VERY popular with tourists. Go early, or you will have a long wait. The food is expensive and fairly good. My teens like the music memorabilia, displays and music videos playing.
Had a great night out here - open late - great cocktails and shots - music a bit loud - but it is hard rock - great food - great service - love it
First time in my life I go to a HR to have an hamburger. One of the best I ever had. Excellent ambiance and service (John is high class service provider).
Food was ok but slightly disappointed. Pre booked and prepaid in the UK for both Hard Rock and Planet Hollywood. Planet Hollywood far better food. Cocktails were nice though.
It is always worth to have a look in the hrc. The turkey burger is absolutely delicious.

column3: Good food in a fun environment
column4: The service was great, the food was tasty, the environment was fun.

column3: After time square visit, it is great place to go..
column4: Wow, great time with my family after time square visit. We enjoyed this place as well. I loved being here and totally worth it!!!
Its the same as most your HR cafe but just a bigger bar and bigger atmosphere really enjoyed our night there.
Food was average but atmosphere is great! Excellent gift shop as well!
good food, our bartender was outstanding and even gave us free shots!
good food and Touristy vibes....................................
Loved the decor and the food was delicious!! Very reasonably priced.
Don't pay any attention to the length of the line . They take tips to get you in quick. Food was as per Hard Rocks . Music was Cool. Staff attentive.
I loved it here, it was simply extravagant. The servers were great, however, I was only satisfied with the food, could have been better, or worse.
fast and efficient service food fresh and tasty wonderful fish & chips ,huge portions and endless supply of coca cola
Excellent service, the wait staff was over the top wonderful! enjoyed it so much.
We love to visit Hard Rock Cafes and this one didn't let us down. In Times Square, Beetles memorabilia and much more. Reliable if a little pricey good food.

column3: Great place to celebrate a special occasion
column4: Staff and food fantastic The best Hard Rock Cafe we have so far visited.

column3: Better value than Planet Hollywood, same location and setting
column4: Located at Times square, good barfood and service with a personal touch. Try the nacho's as an appetizer (you better share the plate because it's a lot).
Food was great, quick service!! Will be back again soon!!
A must for travelers with teenagers. They loved every minute of this, the food, the memorabilia and especially the deserts
All located below Time square in New York was like an ampitheatre in the middle of it all. Great food great atmosphere you cant beat the Hard Rock Brand
This was my first time eating at a Hard Rock Cafe. We went in at 4:45pm and waited an hour and a half on a Sat. night. The potato skins and steak were delicious.
We didn't get to eat here,but we have ate at other ones. So much to see&buy.
The atmosphere was great however the wait was a little long.
the food was excellent and so were the staff and the whole experience was trully amazing

Quite a large queue of people waiting for a table but well worth the wait. Food was gorgeous.. Get a steak!.. Our waitress couldnt of done a better job. Atmosphere was brilliant and the rock tunes just set it off :)
Ever country or big city we travel to my friends and I are try to go to hardrock cafe. It's just a thing we do. The food is always awesome, as are the drinks.
Buffett hot breakfast, all you can eat and drink and served in style by David the best waiter in the world. Competent, confident and not to be missed. Oh and take your camera...
Don't miss the Beetles dress and don't forget to take a photo in front of those numerous guitars! Awesome memorabilia, food is just OK, service is good.
quite pricey, and like every other hard rock cafe, but still enjoyed the food alot, and staff were very good
The atmosphere, service, food, music, and price were all great! Our wait was not too bad either!!!!!
Expect to eit for table even in mid week. Good service when you godt a table. Food is as expected - ok.

column3: what's bad about great appetizers and rock memorabilia?
column4: Nothing. HRC NYC is a good drive by - food is always reliable and solid if not good value. Always something to see and of course, love Jerry.

column3: good space in there, but crowded.
column4: looks like a place to go on an off day. on a long weekend, not the true hard rock experience.

We went here for dinner for my daughter's 18th birthday. The food was hot, fresh and good! The service was fantastic and whilst there the staff did a dance off! What a great night we had. Definitely worth a visit.
A good spot for a quick and late bites when nothing is available.
Food as always in HR cafe was excellent, but the waiter made us feel very, very rushed! Enjoyed the Bud Light Lime, which they had introduced into the drink range, very refreshing!
If in a large group , make reservations earlier. We were in a large group and had to wait for a good time, but is was a very nice dinner. Good food, warm service, nice scene.
had a great time in hard rock cafe, food was good and service was fantastic, only downfall had to wait 25 miuntes for a table for two
Thw service was awesome! The food was awesome as well. A bit expensive but what a cool place!
Great atmosphere although we were a little chilly as we were directly underneath the air con but the food was great so we put up with it :)
This restaurant had outstanding food! The staff were polite and service was really good.
great food, great atmosphere! really interesting seeing all the guitars etc placed around the rooms! Really speedy service and friendly staff, definately a great choice for food and a great night!
Service is good, food is Hard Rock. Music WAY too loud. We had good service, but it seems like most of the wait staff and hostess is pissed off at the world.

column3: Best Location in New York City!
column4: Right in Times Square great food, fun place! Great view of the area full of energetic contagious fun! Pricing the best in the area, extremely affordable!

column3: Better Places to bring the family
column4: Please do yourself a favor and go someplace else. Hard Rock's can be found all around the world. You are in New York City, explore your options. There are many.
Haven't been there in a while because the food it ordinary and overpriced.
What can I say. Excellent location, well cooked food, reasonably priced and attentive staff. Definitely worth going to. Only slight problem, drinks are expensive.
We had drinks and apps. And got our hurricane glasses. Nothing special going on the night we went.

Always busy but always enjoyable - good food and friendly service. Although the pricing can be a little above average I always enjoy my meals. The Hard Rock in NY was no different than any other Hard Rock experience - except maybe a little busier.
I love Hard Rock and this one is fabulous. Food and service fantastic plus the music gives it a brilliant atmosphere. The shop is excellent too.
Great burgers, music and the best coffee in the world.
Dined her twice on our 5 night visit and enjoyed both meals immensely. Would definitely recommend. Only had a to wait a short time and it was worth waiting for

The food here is always fresh and good from NY to New Orleans........ I always try to visit a Hard Rock Cafe in my travels... I have collected about 12 Magnets from all over the world..... Paris, NYC, Argentina, Cayman Island, PR, etc....
Hard rock is in a great location on Time Square. The memorabilia is amazing and the food and service are too.
Titanic/Twilight costumes on display, malted shakes, sliders ($10!); chain restaurant or not-no complaints, just full bellies, good service, they can handle the crowds.

Food was good but expensive. Location in Time Square doesn't get much better. Forget about any type of conversation is was way to loud. I like loud music but the quality and the type of music gave me a headache.
Noisy... if you like mediocre service and school cafeteria food. .. This is your place.
Didn't have time to eat here but it is a great place for cocktails and drinks. Have been in many of them around the globe and really enjoyed this one. Shop is great with bargains galore.
Breakfast all you can eat is great value. Good atmosphere at night for drinks and food.
I like Hard rock all the time, but I was expecting more of the HR in NY, food was ok but not excellent.
Went in the middle of the afternoon so at least there was no line at all - a major plus. Six of us had drinks and nachos for about $80 - yikes! And I wouldn't say the service was impeccable.
We really enjoyed the HRC @ Times Square. The food and service were very good, and they give the kids lots of drawing games.
Had a late dinner after seeing Wicked. Even at 11:30PM, we had to wait about 30 minutes, but the time passed quickly with all the things to see. Excellent server and excellent food. Good times!
VEry friendly andf pretty fast service. Had the Red, white, and blue burger with hot sauce and blue cheese - hug portions - juicy, but I prefer flame broil over flat top

column3: Rock'n good food and excellent staff!
column4: Always hit the Hard Rock in the big Cities! Never had a bad meal and NYC was no exception, our steaks were fantastic and our waiter bought us a drink just for being " Cool Canadian dudes" lol
Shop and restaurant. As everything else on Times Square, big crowds are expected. Mid price range, mid service. Very touristic. Need to experience only once probably.
Efficient system to seat people when it's busy, lots of space, great atmosphere and good quality food
Not the cheapest in Times Square but well worth the visit. Good service and Burgers are great.
Great service and great food but struggled greatly to hear our waitress due to the volume of the music inside the venue!
The place is good to hang around with friend and family, but don't expected to see any part of the street. The restaurant is really downstairs.
great cocktails manhatton iced tea is a must lovely food great and huge portions music great and juan the bar man a star!
I enjoyed my meal, staff very nice, highly recommend a visit
Well known experience, good service compared to other locations of Hard Rock in other sites. Recommended for large groups.
Standard Hard Rock fayre. Friendly helpful staff. We like the chain and wanted to see what collectables they had - the Beatles suits from Hard Days Night!
Don't go to hard rock if you're looking for Michellin star food. It's American diner fayre but it's good. Good food, good atmosphere, great service. One of the best of it's type that I've visited.
visited the night previous for drinks, and returned tonight for a meal. service friendly & food extremely fast. impressed...
I've been to the HRC in Times Square 3 times in the last 2 years and have never been disappointed. Great Beatles memormibilia, etc. Great service too.
HRC is great in every city, but this one has incredible things like Beatles and Elvis original clothes and guitars! Amazing place, great food!
The food is ok, just like any other Hard Rock Cafe in the world, steaks, burger and fries. But the atmosphere in this one is memorable. Very entertaining for all ages and worth the visit!
Late night meal after everywhere else had closed. We ate at the bar & got quick friendly service. The food was actually pretty good & the bartender kept our drinks coming!
